Al'ummar yankin kudu maso gabashin Najeriya su na mayar da martani kishiyoyin juna kan wasu labarun da suka bazu a karshen makon nan, inda aka ambaci kungiyar tabbatar da kafuwar kasar   ta MASSOB tana ikirarin cewa wannan abu da suke hankoro ya kusa ya tabbata 

Wakilin Muryar Amurka, Alphonsus Okoroigwe, ya tattauna da wasu mazauna yankin wadanda ke cewa sun gwammace zama a cikin Najeriya, idan har za a ra abubuwa ta yadda za a rika yin adalci ga kowa da kowa Yace idan ba za a iya ba kuwa, to abu mafi alheri a bar su su kafa kasarsu ta   

Sai dai kuma wani dan yankin mai suna Maduga yace koda yake bai san inda aka kai a game da batun kafa   ba, yayi imani da cewa ko ba dade ko ba jima za a kafa ta 

Wani mai fashin baki Malam Abdullahi Rigasa, ya fadawa wakilin namu cewa za a ci gaba da samun irin wadannan kiraye-kiraye na neman  wa muddin dai ba a kawo daidaito a kasa ba, musamman ma dai bai ma ko  dan kasa hakki 

Kakakin tsohon shugaban Najeriya, Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida, wato Kassim Afegbua, ya bayyana cewa bai samu wata takardar gayyata daga 'yan sanda da ke cewa ya mika ka ko kuma a kama shi ba 


Jaridun Najeriya da dama a yau Litinin sun ruwaito cewa shugaban ‘yan sandan kasar, Ibrahim Iis, ya nemi Kassim Afegbua, kakakin tsohon shugaban Najeriya Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida, da ya mika ka cikin sa’o’i ko kuma a kama shi 

Umurnin na zuwa ne yayin da ake zargin Afegbua da rubuta wata sanarwa da yawun Babangida ba tare da izni ba 

Shi dai Afegbua ya kwashe sama da shekaru goma yana magana da yawun tsohon shugaban, kuma ya mu rahotanni da ke cewa 'yan sanda sun ce a kama shi 

"Babu wani batu kamar haka da ke cewa 'yan sanda sun ce a kama ni Inji Afegbua, kamar yadda jaridar yanar gizo ta ta wallafa 

Sanarwar da ya fitar a ranar Asabar a madadin Babangida, ta yi nuni da cewa Babangida ya nemi shugaba Muhammadu Buhari da kada ya ya takara a zaben 

Sai dai ba tare da bata lokaci ba, tsohon shugaban ya mu fitar da wannan sanarwar, yana mai kira ga ‘yan Najeriya da su yi watsi da ita 

Ina da hanyar da zan tuntubi shugaban kasa ba tare da wata ma la ba, ba sai na fito na yayata ma yata a baina jama’a ba Babangida ya fada a wata sanarwa da ya fitar bayan bayyanar ta Afegbua 

Amma a wata hira da ya yi da gidan talbijin din a baya, Afegbua ya ce yana kan bakarsa kan cewa da yawun tsohon shugaban kasar ya fitar da wannan sanarwar 

Wannan lamari ya janyo ka-ce-na-cea kanin 'yan siyasa da masana kan wa ke da gaskiya a wannan lamari 

Wannan takaddama har ila yau na zuwa ne, kasa da makwanni biyu bayan da tsohon shugaban Najeriya ya fitar da wata sanarwa, wacce ta nemi shugaba Buhari da kada ya ya takara a shekarar 

Ita ma wannan wasika ta haifar da cece-ku-ce a kanin al'umar Najeriya inda aka yi tsokaci na nuna goyon bayan da kuma akasin haka 
Wata sabuwar ma la da ke addabar wasu kasashe musamman ma masu taso wa, ita ce yadda ake amfani da kafofin sada zumunta na ,ba tare da ka’ida ba, lamarin da ke kara ruruta wutar rikice-rikicen da ke faruwa 


Shafukan sada zumunta na na taka muhimmiyar rawa wajen samun labarai ko aika wa da sako a kanin al’umma 

Kafofi irinsu Badoo, Instagram, , kan samar da labarai tare da sada zumunta cikin sauki 

Sai dai yayin da a kasashen da aka ci gaba akan yi amfani da wadannan kafofi ta hanyoyin da suka dace, a kasashe masu tasowa da alamun ba haka labarin yake ba 

Arch Sa’adatu Aminu Raji, malama a babbar kwalejin kimiyya da fasaha ta jihar Adamawa, wato Adamawa , ta ce, wasu har yanzu ba su iya amfani da wadannan kafofi ta yadda ya kamata ba 

A cewarta maimakon samun ilimi, labari ko fasaha, wasu sun koma yada karya da ta da husuma 

Shi ko Malam Muhammad Lawal Danladi, ya ce abun mamaki wasu sun yi amfani da hotunansu lokacin da aka samu tashin bam, wanda ya ru da su a massalacin kwalejin, wajen nuna hotunansu a ma yin daya daga cikin hotunan rikicin yankin Mambilla a jihar Taraba 

A cewar Malam Dandali, wannan abun ya ba shi mamaki 

Saurari rahoton Ibrahim Abdulaziz domin karin bayani

 Ba a Bin Ka’idojin Amfani Da Kafafen Sada Zumunta – Masana 
 
Ba a Bin Ka’idojin Amfani Da Kafafen Sada Zumunta – Masana 
Yayin da ake ci gaba da kokarin dakile yaduwar cutar zazzabin cutar Lassa da ke bayyana a wasu jihohin Najeriya, an tabbatar da mutuwar mutum a jihar wadanda suka mutu sanadiyar wannan cuta 


Hukumomi a jihar da ke kudu maso yammacin Najeriya, sun tabbatar da mutuwar mutum bayan da suka kamu da cutar zazzabin cutar Lassa 

Akalla mutane hukumomin jihar suka tabbatar sun kamu da wannan cuta a kananan hukumomi takwas daga kananan hukumomi da jihar ke da su 

Sakamakon binciken da aka gudanar a dakin bincike, ya tabbatar da mutuwar mutum Inji gwamna, yayin wani taro a garin Owo 

Jami’an lafiya da gwamnan jihar sun yi kira ga jama’a da su yi sauri su garzaya zuwa asibiti mafi kusa idan suka fara jin alamun zazzabi 

Ita dai cutar zazzabin Lassa, ta kan samo asali ne daga beraye 

Wannan kuma ba shi ne karon farko da ta halaka mutane a Najeriya ba 


Tsohon shugaban Najeriya, Janar Ibrahim Babangida, ya bayar da sanarwa dauke da sanya hannu , yana mu wata takardar da wani ya rubuta da suna , yana mai fadin cewa wannan ra'ayin marubucin ne amma ba nasa ba 

A cikin wannan wasika da aka yi ta cacar baki a kanta, an ce tsohon shugaban ya bukaci shugaba Muhammadu Buhari da kada ya nemi yawa takara a shekarar , a maimakon haka a kyale wani matashi ya ya takara 

Jiya lahadi da maraice, Janar Babangida ya maida martani kan wannan wasika, inda yace ai idan yana da irin wannan ra'ayi, ya san hanyoyin da zai iya bi na sanar da wadanda suka kamata, ba sai ya fito cikin bainar jama'a yana irin wannan ikirari ba 

Wani hadimin Janar Babangida, Zubairu Iis Abdur-Rauf, yace neman gwaninta ne ya sa wanda ya rubuta wasikar, wanda aka ce wani tsohon jami'i ne a tsohuwar gwamnatin Jihar Edo, yayi abinda yayi ba tare da yawun shi Janar Babangida ba 

Wannan al'amari dai ya mamaye kafofin labarai na Najeriya tun bullarsa jiya lahadi da safe 

Ga cikakken rahoto na Mustapha Nasiru Ba ri kan wannan batu

 Janar Babangida Yace Bai Rubuta Takarda A Kan Buhari Ba 
 
Janar Babangida Yace Bai Rubuta Takarda A Kan Buhari Ba 
Fadar shugaban Najeriya ta kare nadin da shugaba Muhammadu Buhari yayi ma ambasada Ahmed Rufa'i Abubakar a ma yin kta-janar na hukumar leken asiri ta Najeriya, wadda a cikin 'yan kwanakin nan ta shiga cikin rikici 

Mai magana da yawun shugaban kasa, Malam Garba Shehu, yace masu yin adawa da nadin Ambasada Abubakar, su na amfani da kafofin yada labarai wajen baza karairayin cewa shi ba dan Najeriya ba ne 

Malam Garba Shehu yace da gaske ne an haifi sabon babban ktan hukumar ta a kasar Chadi, ya kuma yi karatun firamare a can, amma kowa ya san cewa shi dan Jihar Katsina ne, kuma a nan ya komo ya kammala karatu 

Game da korafin da masu adawa da nadin suke yi na cewa bai canta ba, yace Ambasada Abubakar yayi aiki har ya kai ma yin mataimakin kta a cikin ita wannan hukuma ta NIA, mukamin da ya rike na won shekaru Yace da aka zo jarrabawa ma, Ambasada Abubakar ya samu hayewa zuwa ga mukamin kta, amma ya hakura da karbar kujerar ya bar ma wasu 

Malam Tijjani Isa na wata kungiya dake k kanta , yace wadannan bayanai da gwamnatin ke bayarwa game da nadin Ambasada Abubakar, su na kara dagula lamarin ne, domin a cewarsa, a yayin da Malam Shehu Garba ke fadin cewa lallai a Chadi aka haifi sabon kta janar din, shi kuwa fada yayi cikin takardu na aiki cewa a Katsina aka haife shi 

Ya kara da cewa a bisa ri, dole ne duk wanda zai zamo kta janar na wannan hukuma, ya kase daya daga cikin ktocinta Shi kuwa Ambasada Abubakar, yayi ritaya daga hukumar, kuma a lokacin da yayi yana ma yin mukaddashin kta ne 

Ga cikakken bayani a wannan rahoto na Umar Faruk Musa daga Abuja 

 Cacar Baki Kan Shugabin Hukumar Leken Asiri Ta Najeriya 
 
Cacar Baki Kan Shugabin Hukumar Leken Asiri Ta Najeriya 
A cigaba da cece-kucen da ake yi game da makomar siyasar Najeriya a , tsohon Shugaban Najeriya Janar Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida murabus ya ne ka daga zargin cewa ya yi kira ga 'yan Najeriya da kar su zabi Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari a zaben 


Da alamar tsohon Shugaban Najeriya, Janar Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida murabus, ya ne ka daga wata wasikar da mai magana da yawu , Kassim Afegbua ya danganta ta da shi Wasikar, wadda ke nuna cewa Babangida ya nuna bai son a sake zaben Shugaban Kasa Muhammadu Buhari, ta janyo murza gashin baki a fagen siyasar Najeriya 

Kodayake babu inda wasikar ta fito karara ta nuna cewa Babangida bai son a zabi Buhari, akalla akwai jirwaye mai kamar wanka game da wannan batu a wasikar Hasalima a wani babi mai Wata Tunani Mai Zurfi a wasikar, biri ya yi kama da mutum game da rashin son Buhari ya sake yawa takara A wannan babin an nuna kamar Babangida na cewa Ya kamata mu bai wa Shugaba Muhammadu Buhari hadin kai don ya kammala wa’adi mai cika ran ga watan Mayun sannan mu yi sharar fage ga sabbin shugabannin da za su jagori kasar 

Babangida, a cewar marubucin, ya kara da cewa, A yayin da na ke wannan bayanin, ba wai ina hana Shugaba Buhari ‘yi na yin zabe da kuma na a zabe shi ba ne, to amma akan shiga wani irin lokaci a rayuwar kowace kasa wanda lokaci ne da ya kamata a fifita Muradin kasa bisa na kai 

Wasikar ta kuma tabo tashe-tashen hankulan da Najeriya ke fama da su, inda ta danganta Babangida da cewa, Kama daga Kudin Kaduna zuwa Taraba, daga jahar Binuwai zuwa jahar , daga Edo zuwa Zamfara, jina-jina ake ta yi A garin Da dau na jahar Zamfara, kwanan nan aka yi asarar rayuka sama da babu gaira babu dalili Kisan kiyashin da aka yi a Binuwai ma ya sa na fara tambayar anya wannan ce kasar da wasunmu mu yi yakin tabbatar da kasewarta kasa guda Yanzu akan bayyana Najeriya da kasar da jini ke malala kamar ruwan kogi 

To sai dai a wata wasika mai dauke da sa hannun Babangida da ka , wadda wasu kafafe su ka rabar, tsohon Shugaban ya mu kalaman da kakakin nasa ya danganta shi da su Ya ce, Ya ku ‘yan jarida barin in gaya ma ku dalla-dalla cewa a ma yina na tsohon Shugaban Kasa kuma dattijo, ina da cikakken sukunin ganawa da hukumomi na can sama ba tare da na bi ta hanyar janyo cece-kuce a bainar jama’a ba Saboda haka, kalaman da aka fada a can wato a waccen wasikar ra’ayi ne na marubucin kawai 
To ai a wasikar ne ka daga wasikar da Kassim ya rattaba wa hannu a madadi , Babangida ya nuna damuwarsa game da tabarbarewar yanayin ro a Najeriya

Mashahuran 'yan Najeriya ciki harda mataimakin shugaban kasa Parfessa ne suka yi jawabi a hidimar bizinar

A ranar jumma'a aka yi hidimar jana'izar tsohon mataimakin shugaban Najeriya , Yay mataimakin shugaban kasa a zamanin jamhuryar ta biyu mataimakin shugaban Najeriya Alhaji Shehu Shagari 

Da yake magana a haduwar, mataimakin shugaban Najeriya Parfessa , ya yaba da irin gudumawar da ya bayar a ci gaban Najeriya ta ko   fanni da ya taba 

Haka shima da yake magana, tsohon babban sakataren kungiyar kasshe renon Ingila, , yace marigayin ya taka rawar gani a fannonin rayuwa a uku muhimmai, a siyasar Najeriya, ta kasa-da-kasada kuma taimakon marasa galihu 

Da yake hira da wakilin Sashen Hausa , tsohon ministan albarkatun ruwa na Najeriya, Mukhtari Shagari, ya bayyana mutuwar, a zaman babban rashi ba ga iyala ba kadai, amma kasa baki daya 

Ya yaba da dottaku da halin mutuntawa da suka yi aiki da mahaifi , tsohon shugaban kasa Alhaji Shehu Uan Aliyu Shagari 

Gwamnoni na da dana yanzu, ministoci da dubun dubatan jama'a ne suka yi cicirindo a harabar cocin da aka yi hidimar, a garin Oko cikin karamar hukumar Orumba ta Arewa,inde aka binne shi 
Kungiyoyin sun kira taron manema labarai ne ganin yadda a idon Gwamna magoya baya ko 'yan banga ke dauke da makamai 

Gamayyar kungiyoyi masu zaman kansu na jihar Kano sunyi Allah wadai da yunkurin Jami’an gwamnatin jihar Kano da sanatocin dake wakiltar jihar a majalisar dattawan Najeriya keyi na dawo da siyasar daba a jihar 

A wani taron manema labarai da suka kira a karshen mako, gayammar kungiyoyin fararen hula dana gwagwarmaya, sunce abubauwan dake faruwa kanin tsoho da sabon gwamnan jihar Kano da kuma mukarraban su, bai dace da ri da akida da kuma tarbiyyar al’umar Kano ba 

Hajiya Aisha Dankani Kenan guda cikin shugabannin kungiyoyin gwagwarmar tabbatar da shugabi na gari a jihar Kano cikin wadanda suka yi magana 

Ita kuwa Hajiya Hauwa Ibrahim Elyakub, cewa tayi tafan da shugabannin gwamnatin Kano da wakilan Kano a majalisar dattawan najeriya suka kama abu ne da ka iya gurbata tarbbiyyar al’uma mai tasowa a jihar 

Masu kula da al’amura dai na ganin cewa, matakin gamayyar kungiyoyin gwagwarmayar na yanzu tamkar fargar jaji ne, to amma Ibrahim Wayya na cewa ba haka lamarin yake ba 

Kwamandan runduna ta Manjo Janar ne ya bayyana haka a wani taro da manema labarai 

Runduna ta ta mayakan Najeriya a jahar Borno, wacce take fafatawa da 'yan bindigar Boko Haram ta ceto mutane fiye da , galibinsu mata, daga hanun 'yan binidgar a dajin Sambisa 

Kwamandan rundunar, karkashin shirin "Lafiya Dole,"' ne, ya bayyana haka a wani taro da manema labarai a birnin Maiduguri 

Janar, yayi amfani da taron ya karyata jita-jitar da 'yan Boko Haram din suke yadawa cewa, duk wanda ya mika wuya sojojin suna kashe su 

Tunda farko Janaryace wutar da dakarun sama na Najeriya suka yi bari a sa nin 'yan bindigar, ita ta sa suka sami nasarar gamawa da illahirin 'yan binidgar da suke wurin, kuma suka sami nasarar kubutar da wadannan mutane 

Kwamandan na Lafiya Dole, yace duk dan binidgar da yake son miuka wuya, a shirye rudunar take ta karbe shi 

Daya daga cikin wadanda suka kubuta wace bata fadi sunanta ba, sai dai ta ce a dajin ita matar likitan Abubakar Shekau ne Sunan Likitan Abu Yasir Da Haruna ya tambayeta ko Abu Yasir din boka ne ko likitan kwarai, tace "a'a kwararre ne, domin har tiyata yana yi 

An mika mutanen ga hukumomin jahar Borno, ta hanun hukumar agajin gaggawa Hukumar tayi alkawarin zata yi aiki domin mutanen su murmure su koma cikin al'uma

 Abdullahi Umar Ganduje gwamnan Kano 
 
 Abdullahi Umar Ganduje gwamnan Kano 
Rarraba 
Zaben kananan hukumomi a jahar kano ya dogara ne kan makomar irin hukuncin da kotu zata yanke talata mai zuwa 

Hukumar zabe ta jihar Kano ta ce ta kammala shirye-shiryen da suka kamata domin gudanar da zaben kananan hukumomin jihar a ranar asabar mai zuwa wato ga wannan wata na Fabareru, a yayin da babbar kotun jihar ta zata sanar da hukuncin ta a ranar Talata dangane da karar da Jam’iyyar ta shigar gabanta tana kalubalantar hukumar zaben 
Hukumar dai tace ta tuni ta dauki ma’aikatan wucin gadi da zasu tallafa mata wajen gudanar da zaben, inda za’a zabi shugabannin kananan hukumomi da mataimakan su da kuma kansilolin a fadin jihar ta Kano 
Sai dai, Jam’iyyar na kalubalantar hukumar zaben a kotu game da kudaden da take karba daga hannun ‘yan takara To amma Garba Ibrahim Sheka dake zaman shugaban hukumarna cewa 

Kotun dai ta saurari karar a juma’ar nan karkashin jagorin mai rikon kujerar babban jojin jihar Nura Sagir kuma ta fitar da ranar talatar makon gobe domin yanke hukunci 
a yayin zaman bangarorin biyu sun bada bahasi Ibrahim mukhtar dake zaman atoni janar kuma kwamishinan shari’a na jihar Kano ke kare hukumar zabe 
Anasa bangaren lauyan Jam’iyyar Abdul Adamu na cewa, jam'iyyar ta gabatar da hujjoji da zsu gamsar da kotu kan haramcin kudade da hukumar zaben jahar cacin 'yan takara 
 Abdul Adamu Fagge Kenan lauyan Jam’iyyar

Wata Hadakar Kungiyoyin Jahar Taraba Ta Nemi Gwamna Ya Gayawa Duniya Wadanda Suke shirin Kawo Hari A Jahar 
Fabrairu , 

Ibrahim Abdul'aziz

 TARABA Gwamna 
 
TARABA Gwamna 
Rarraba 
 Wata Hadakar Kungiyoyin Jahar Taraba Ta Nemi Gwamna Ya Gayawa Duniya Wadanda Suke shirin Kawo Hari A Jahar 
A Yada 
Biyo bayan kalaman da gwamnan jihar Taraba, Isiyaku yayi na cewa za’a kawo jihar hari nan da kwanaki goma, yanzu haka yan jihar sun soma maida martani tare da yin kira da a gaggauta gudanar da bincike 

Shi dai gwamnan wanda ya zargi gwamnatin tarayya da shaku bangaro game da abubuwan dake faruwa,yace dole jihohi su dauki matakin kare kai 

Gwamnan wanda ke yiwa tawagar shugabanin jam’iyar ta kasa da suka ziyarce shi a Jalingo,yace su yanzu suna cikin mawuyacin hali,kasan cewar basa iko da jami’an ro 

‘’ Yanzu ina zaune ne tamkar san da babu rawani akai, domin baka iko da yan sanda ko jami’an ro,duk lokacin da muka nemi dauki ba’a kawo mana da gaggawa,wai sai sun sami umarni daga Abuja 

‘’Yanzu haka ana shirin kawo mana hari nan da kwanaki goma,kuma kwanannan wani jirgin sama mai saukar angulu wato ya sauka a wani kauye cike da makamai, dole mu fadawa duniya halin da muke ciki,’’ a cewar gwamnan jihar Taraban 

Yanzu haka ma dai, wannnan kalaman gwamnan ya tada hankulan jama’an jihar inda wasu kungiyoyi ke kira ga gwamnatin Najeriya hanzarta binciken wannan lamari A wajen wani taron manema labarai da hadakar kungiyar cigaban Taraba,ta Taraba ‘’ ta kira a Jalingo,shugaban kungiyar M B Mustapha ya bayyana kalaman gwamnan da katobara da ya kamata a bincika 

To sai dai kuma hukumomin ro a jihar sun ce,kawo yanzu basu sami bayanan da gwamnan ke zargi ba,kuma su kullum a shirye suke na dakile duk wani hari,ko fitina da ka iya tashi a jihar Misal,kakakin rundunan yan sandan jihar Taraban,ya bukaci jama’a da su bada bayanan duk wani abu da basu amince da shi ba 

Hakanan kuma kakakin yan sandan ya mu zargin da gwamnatin jihar ta yi na cewa Fulani makiyaya sun kashe wasu tibabe hudu a yankin Gassol

Mata 'yan Najeriya da ma wasu daga kasashen Afirka sun tsinci kansu a halin bauta sakamakon zuwa kasar Saudiya neman aikin yi inda aka ce ana azabtar da su 

 
Hotuna da wasu sakonnin bidiyo da dai sauransu sun nuna yadda 'yan Najeriya da wasu ma daga kasashen Afirkan kan tsinci kansu cikin takaici a Saudiya 

Hakan ko na faruwa ne sakamakon shiga kasar ta Larabawa domin neman aikin yi 

Zargin azaftar da matan Afirka a Saudiya na kara ta'azzara saboda hatta kungiyar hadin kan Afirka, wato AU, a zamanta na baya bayan nan ta tabo batun inda ta nemi kawo karshen bautar da 'yan Afirka ke shiga a Saudiya 

Amina Umar Al-Hammadi wata 'yar jihar Borno dake zaune a Saudiya ta tabbatar da fadawar mata cikin garalin Ta ce masu kawo matan kan fada masu cewa indan sun je Saudiya ga kudaden da za'a basu alhali kuwa ana bautar dasu ne Ta kara da cewa wulakin da suke fuskanta ya wuce iyaka Babu abinci, kana ga duka da zagi An mayar dasu tamkar awaki 

Amina ta gargadi hukumar Najeriya ta toshe hanyar kawo 'yan kasar a wulake Injita, su da suke kasar zasu taimaka amma gwamnatin Najeriya ma ta tashi ta taimaka Ta hana masu safarar mutane da suke kawosu 

Muhammad Sani Inusa karamin jakadan Najeriya a Saudiya ya ce suna da labarin ana bautar da 'yan Najeriya a Saudiya Suna bincike Kawo yanzu sun gano kamfuna biyu dake kawo mutane Daya shi ne Kamfani kuma a wuri sun samu sunayen mutane da suka kawo Yanzu suna bin mutanen daya bayan daya suna tattara baya nai Inji Inusa da zara sun gama zasu mikawa ma'aikatar harkokin wajen Najeriya ta san matakan da zata dauka

Za ku iya son wannan ma
Shugaban kungiyar bunkasa ci gaban fasahar sadarwa mai suna tace ko  dan Najeriya na da rawar da zai taka domin samar da zaman lafiya cikin kasa 

Shugaban na kungiyar ta bunkasa ci gaban fasahar sadarwa mai suna da ke bibiyar kalamun batin da ake yayatawa a kafofin yada labarai da kuma na sada zumunta, yayi bayanin cewa kalamun bati masu nasaba da addini da kabili sai karuwa suke yi a cikin al’umma 

Cibiyar tayi wannan bayanin ne a wani taron gudanar a Bauchi na masu ruwa da ki musammam masu mu'amala da kafofin yada labarun da suka hada da ‘yan siyasa da kuma ‘yan jarida 

Jim kadan da kammala taron nasu, shugaban na Malam Zakariya Ya'u yace, kalaman bati a cikin al’umma har yanzu da sauran rina a kaba Ya shaidawa wakilin sashen Hausa na Muryar Amurka Abdulwahab yadda yake kallon abin 

Inda yace sun lura cewa yaki da kalaman bati da sauran hobbasar da ya kamata kowa yayi, don haka kowa yana da rawar da zai taka Yace musamman a ‘yan kwanakin nan lamarin sai karuwa yake yi ta fuskar addini da kabili

Mahalarta taron da dama da Sashen Hausa ya yi hira da su, sunce wannan taron yazo daidai lokaci da ya dace musamman ganin yadda ake kara zaman doya da manja kanin Musulmi da Kirista, yayinda ake fama da rikicin Fulani da Makiyaya da kuma rikicin Boko Haram, da na ‘yan bindigarduk da yake wan ya dan lafa, sai dai a ma yin kasa baki daya ana fuskantar kalubalar ro, da rikice rikicen da ake dangantawa da harkar siyasar kasar

Taron da aka saba gudanarwa duk shekara, ya sami halartar mai martaba San Musulmi Mahammad Sa’ad Abubakar , da shugabannin addinin Kirista, da kuma wadansu shugabannin al’umma daga arewacin kasar, inda aka gabatar da jawabai da kasidu

UN Na Bukatar $m Domin Kulawa Da 'Yan Gudun Hijirar Kasashen Tafkin Chadi
A Yada 

A taron jakadun UN da aka yi a Yamai aka fayyace rukan ayyukan da za'a yi bana tare da adadin kudin da ake bukata domin gudanar da ayyukan

 
A karshen taron jakadun UN dake kasashen yankin tafkin Chadi da aka gudanar a birnin Yamai a kasar Nijar aka fayyace rin ayyukan da za'a gudanar a bana, shekarar 

Shirin zai shafi sama da mutane da rikicin Boko Haram ya daidaita Cikinsu akwai 'yan gudun hij Najeriya sama da dubu Ma lr ta shafi masu masaukin baki su sama da dubu a kasashen Nijar, Chadi da Kamaru 

Mataimakiyar kwamishanar UN ta ce zasu yi anfani da kudaden a fannonin da suka hada da ci gaban ayyukan rajistan 'yan gudun hijira a Diffa, yankin da ya fi koina samun bakuncin 'yan gudun hij Najeriya 

Za'a yi anfani da kudin wurin samar da abinci ga al'umma bisa ga yin la'akari da cewa a watan Satumbar an gano mutane miliyan bakwai da rabi ne suke cikin karin abinci a Nijar Kana za'a mayar da hankali akan sha'anin ilimi saboda bincike ya nuna cewa kashi cikin na 'ya'yan mutanen da suka yi hijira a yankin basa zuwa makaranta 

Kazalika za'a dauki matakan samar da cimaka mai jiki ga yara kanana da kuma inganta kiwon lafiya 

Hukumar UN na kokarin shawo ma lar rajistan yaran da aka haifesu a sa nonin 'yan gudun hijira ta hanyar wayar da kawunan jama'a musamman a kasar Kamaru inda makiyaya ke ketarawa zuwa Najeriya domin neman ciyawar dabbobi, inji wakilin 'yan gudun hijira a kasar ta Kamaru 

Jakadan UN a kasar Chadi ya bayyana cewa ci gaban tabarbarewar ro a kewayen tafkin Chadi na kawo cikas ga jami'an agaji wajen isar da doki ga 'yan gudun hijira a kasar ta Chadi 

Baya ga 'yan gudun hij Najeriya, Nijar na samun bakuncin 'yan gudun hij kasar wadanda tuni wasu cikinsu suka fara gudanar da sana'o'i, lamarin da ya sa ana ganin wasunsu ba zasu koma inda suka fito ba duk da ikirarin da UN tayi na cewa mayar da su magana ce ta dan lokaci

Rarraba 
Wasu ‘yan kunar bakin wake sun kai hari sa nin ‘yan gudun hijira na Dalori dake garin Maiduguri a jihar Borno, inda suka kashe mutane biyar da runata wasu ta da 


‘Daya daga cikin ‘yan kunar bakin waken ya samu shiga cikin sa nin ‘yan gudun hijira na Dalori, ya kuma tayar da bam din jiki wanda ya hallaka mutane biyar da raunata wasu ta da Ita kuma ‘yar kunar bakin waken ta biyu ta nufi rukunin gidajen Dolari , inda mutanen unguwar suka gano ta har yara suka yi ta jifanta har sai da ta tayar da bam din jikinta ta kashe kanta kadai 

Unguwar Dalori dai tana da tazarar kilomita uku daga jami’ar Maiduguri, jami’ar da a baya ta sha fama da hare-haren kunar bakin wake 

A cewar shugaban hukumar samar da agajin gaggawa na jihar Borno, Injiniya Ahmed Satomi, ya tabbatar da faruwar lamarin inda yace yanzu haka sun ‘dauke duk mutanen da suka sani rauni zuwa asibiti don samun kulawa 

Wannan karo na farko da ‘yan kunar bakin waken suka kai hari sa nin Dalori, duk da yake sun zuwa ta baya Allah bai basu ikon shiga ba

Kungiyoyi Masu Zaman Kansu a Jihar Taraba Sun Koka a Kan Sake Wasu Yan Bindiga 

Hadakar kungiyoyin Fulani makiyaya a Najeriya sun bukaci gwamnatin Najeriya da ta hanzarta bincike game da kisan gillar da aka yiwa wasu Fulani matafiya a tashar motar garin Gboko dake jihar 


Su dai wadanda aka kashen wadanda ke cikin motar haya, sun taso ne daga jihar Adamawa, kuma suna kan hanyarsu ne na zuwa jihar Kogi to amma sai wasu yan bangan tibi, suka far musu da nan take aka kashe mutum bakwai, biyu yanzu haka suna asibiti yayin da biyu kuma ba’a gansu ba 

Da suke bayyana takaicinsu game da kissan gillar da aka yiwa Fulanin matafiya, hadakar kungiyar makiyayan Najeriya ta Miyetti Allah, ta bukaci gwamnatin Najeriya da ta gaggauta cafke wadanda ke ta hannu a wannan ta’asa 

Su dai fulanin da aka kashen sun taso ne daga jihar Adamawa su goma sha daya, inda suka dauki shatar mota don zuwa jihar Kogi, to amma kuma sai direbansu ya ra zuwa tashar mota ta Gbokon, kuma shigar su ke da wuya sai wasu matasa yan banga suka far musu da nan take suka kashe bakwai daga ciki, biyu kuma yanzu haka ke kwe a gadon asibiti, wanda kawo yanzu ba a ga biyu daga cikin matafiyan ba 

Da yake tabbatar da faruwan lamarin, Mafindi Umaru Danburam dake zama shugaban kungiyar Miyetti Allah na jihohin arewa maso gabas, ya ce yanzu haka suna cikin halin zulumi na faruwar wannan kisan gillan, inda ma ya bukaci gwamnatin tarayya da ta bincika wadanda ke da hannu a lamarin 

Shima da yake karin haske, shugaban kungiyar Miyetti Allah a Najeriya, Alhaji Muhammadu Kiruwa Ardon Zuru, ya ce suna da tababa game da abubuwan dake faruwa yanzu a jihar 

Kakakin rundunar yan sandan jihar Yamu, ya tabbatar da faruwar lamarin, wanda ya aikowa Muryar Amurka da wata sanarwar da rundunar yan sandan jihar ta fitar 

Sanarwar rundunar yan sandan na cewa, da missalin karfe da rabi rundunan yan san jihar ta sami rahoton cewa, an samu wani hargitsi a tashar motar Gboko, kuma nan da nan aka tura yan sandan to sai dai kafin zuwansu har an kashe Fulani matafiya bakwai, kuma an kona gawarwakinsu Binciken farko ya nuna wadanda aka kashen matafiya ne dake kan hanyarsu ta zuwa jihar Kogi Yanzu haka akwai wadanda aka kama kuma ana cigaba da bincike, kuma tuni har an kafa dokar hana fita a garin don tabbatar da doka da oda

Kalaman da aka ce ya yi akan rikicin makiyaya da manoma a jihar Binuwai ya sa kungiyar Yarbawa zalla ta kudu maso yammacin Najeriya ta kira Shugaba Buhari ya tsige ministan ro da kuma yi wa shugabannin hukumomin ron kasa garambawul 

 
A wani taron manema labarai da kungiyar ta kira a garin Akure baban birnin jihar ne ta kira ministan ron Najeriya Mansur Dan Ali da ya sauka daga mukami tare da k shugaba Buhari ya yiwa rin shugabannin ro garambawul ta yadda ko  bangaren Najeriya zai samu wakilci 

A cewar kakakin kungiyar Yinka akwai gyara dangane da yadda harkokin ro ke tafiya a Najeriya musamman ganin yadda ake fadace fadace a jihohi daban daban Sun ambaci fada kanin Fulani makiyaya da manoma a jihohin Binuwai da Nasarawa da Taraba da kuma Adamawa wanda inji kungiyar yaki ci yaki cinyewa 

Wasu 'yan Najeriya sun bayyana ra'ayinsu game da k da ta yi Alhaji Shettima Alfa Uan tsohon jami'in sojan ron Najeriya ya ce a sani shugaban koli na ro Bayerabe ne da sun ce shi ma ya sauka Yakamata su yaba ma Mansur Dan Ali bisa ayyukan ro da ya yi a arewa maso gabas 

Sai dai a cewar shugaban kungiyar ta Ayo Adebanjo akwai bukatar aiwatar da rin nan na yiwa Najeriya kanta garambawul 

Wasu 'yan Najeriya kuma na ganin ma yin kungiyar na kan turba Inji wani kungiyar ta fadi ra'ayinta ne kawai idan kuma tana da hujja ta bayyana a gani Wani kuma cewa ya yi 'yan arewa ne ya kamata su yi korafi akan ro saboda wai har yanzu abun da ya shafi harakar ro babu ci gaba

A jihar Neja, majalisar dokoki ta gayyaci kwamishanan 'yan sandan jihar ya bayyana gabanta ya bayyana mata matakan da yake dauka domin kawo karshen sace sace da kashe kashen mutane da ake yi a jihar musamman a yankuna biyu 

A cewar majalisar sace mutane domin neman kudin fa na kara ta'azzara a jihar, musamman a yankunan San Pawa da Pandogari dake kan iyaka da jihar Kaduna Lamarin na matukar tayar da hankalin majalisar 

Onarebul Sha'aibu Liman Iya shugaban kwamitin labarai na majalisar ya yiwa Muryar Amurka karin haske Ya ce majalisa ta ga ya kyautu a gayyato kwamishanan 'yan sandan akan yawan sace sace da kashe kashen mutane a jihar Lamarin ro ne da ya shafi kowa a jihar 

Kakakin 'yan sandan Abubakar Dan Inna ya ce duk da cewa takardar gayyatar kwamishanan bata isa wurinsu ba amma suna da abun shaidawa majalisar akan sha'anin ron jihar

Karin harajin da gwamnatin Nijar ta yi a farkon shekarar nan ya soma yin tasiri a saboda kamfanin wutar lanta ya kara kudi, abun da ya shafi harakar aikin yin nika da injina a kasar, har gidajen nika sun shiga yajin aiki na kwana daya domin jawo hankalin mahukunta akan halin da suke ciki

 
A cikin garin Maradi masu injinan nika sun yar da aiki na yini guda da zummar bayyana ma lar da suke fuskanta sabili da karin kudi da kamfanin wutar lanta ya yi 

To sai dai karin na da nasaba da sabuwar dokar biyan haraji da gwamnatin kasar ta kafa ta kuma fara aiki farkon shekarar nan 

Malam Isaka Boi sakataren kungiyar masu nika a Maradi ya ce tun karfe shida na safe yake zagayawa ya ga gidan nika da yake aiki amma babu ko daya A cewarsa dole ne suka shiga yajin domin babu abun da zasu iya yi 

Muryar Amurka ta garzaya zuwa kamfanin wutar lanta ta ji ta bakinsu Alhaji Mamman Abdulrahaman shugaban kamfanin ya ce abun ya fi karfin kamfanin saboda dokar kasa ce ta kara haraji

Kungiyoyin sa kai a jihar Taraba arewa maso gabashin Najeriya sun yi kira ga sufeta Janar na yan sandan Najeriya da sauran shugabanin ro da su bincika rahotannin dake cewa an saki wasu da aka kama dake da hannu dumu dumu a tashin hankalin da ya auku a yankin Mambilla, makwannin baya 

 
Wannan kuwa ya biyo bayan wasikar da ake zargin gwamnatin jihar ta aikewa rundunan yan sandan jihar na neman sakin wadanda ake tuhumar 

Shi dai wannan korafi, ya biyo bayan zargin cewa rundunan yan sandan jihar Taraban ta soma bin umarnin da gwamnatin jihar ta bata na sakin wasu da ake tuhuma da hannu a hare haren da aka kaiwa Fulani a unin Mambilla da ya jawo asarar rayuka da dama 

Bayanai dai sun tabbar da cewa, kwamishinan shari’a kuma atoni janar na jihar Taraban, Yusufu Akirikwen, shi ya aikewa kwamishinan yan sandan jihar wata wasikar da a shekarar gabata yana neman a saki wadanda aka kama kan batun da yanzu haka allura ke neman tono garma 

A wajen wani taron manema labarai a Jalingo fadar jihar, hadakar kungiyar cigaban Taraba, ta Taraba, ta bukaci sufeta janar na yan sandan Najeriya da ya hanzarta bincikan wannan lamarin, don hukunta mai laifi 
Shugaban Amurka Yayi Jawabi a Kan Halin da Kasa ke Ciki
A Yada 
A jawabi na farko akan halin da kasa ke ciki a jiya Talata, shugaban Amurka , ya yabawa sojojin Amurka 

 
Ya tabo batun wani yaro dan shekaru daga , wanda ya da tutocin Amurka dubu arba’in a kan kabarin tsofaffin sojoji da suka mutu a filin daga, a ranar tunawa tsofaffin sojojin ta kasa Wannan yaro mai suna ya samu g mawa inda kowa ya ye ana yaba masa 

 yayi kira ga majalisar dattawan ta ba ko  babban jami’in gwamnati ikon yabawa ma’aikata na gari, ta hanyar basu kyauta kuma tayi waje da duk ma’aikatan suke cin amanar jama’a da gaza biyan bukatun Amurkawa 

Shugaban na Amurka ya kuma yayi jawabi a kan yanda Amurkawa ke hada kai a yayin da kasar ta fada cikin wani bala’i Amma yace

Yace bai wadatu mu hada kai a lokacin bala’I kadai ba, a wannan ina kira ga ko nmu, mu ajiye bambe bambenmu, mu nemi hanya daya da zata hada kanmu, mu yiwa jama’armu aiki, wannan abu ne mai muhimmi, saboda sune mutan da suka zabomu mu musu aiki 

Sarfilu Hashim Gumel ya tattauna da Farfesa Yusuf Alhassan mai sharhin a kan harkokin siysar Amurka dake zaune a jihar a nan Amurka 

 
 
Matasa daga jihohi na Najeriya zasu amfana da shirin horaswar aikin gona kyauta domin yaki da rashin aikin yi 

 
A kokarinta na samarwa matasa da aikin yi, gwamnatin tarayyar Najeriya ta fara horas da matasa aikin gona kyauta 

Matasa ne da suka kammala karatun manyan makarantu daga jihohi goma zasu fara amfana da wannan sabon rin 

An fara wannan horaswar ce a babbar kwalejin ayyukan gona ta gwamnatin tarayya dake garin Akure a cikin jihar 

Da yake bude bikin horaswar a cikin babban kwalejin aikin gona, shugaban kwalejin Odedina yace ana ba da wannan Horon ne a bisa umurnin Ministan Ayyukan gona da raya karkara 

Yace ana sa ran baiwa matasan wannan horon ne domin su zamo masu dogaro da kansu, wanda za a basu jarin da zasu fara amfani da shi a ma yin   fage

Wakiliyar sashen Hausa Tamar Abari ta ce a zantawar ta da wani dan taliki da ya nemi a boye suna , ya bayyana mata cewa maharan sun kawo hari ne bayan sallar magariba

‘Yan Boko Haram Sunkai Hari A Shetimari
Rundunar 'yan sandan jihar Taraba ta ce zata tabbatar an bi dokar hana kiwo barkatai 

 
A wani yanayi na ba sabam ba, rundunar 'yan sandan jihar Taraba tace zata tabbatar da aiwatar da wannan sabuwar dokar hana kiwon dake ci gaba da jawo cece-kuce a ciki da ma wajen jihar Taraba 
Wannan ma kuwa na zuwa ne yayin da wasu rahotanni ke cewa wasu jami’an ro tuni suka soma amfani da wannan dokar wajen ta r makiyaya, walau a mota ko bisashe batun da kungiyoyin makiyaya ke cewa ba zata sabu ba 
To sai dai kuma rundunar 'yan sandan jihar ta bakin kakakinta, Misal, ta ce zata sa ido wajen aiwatar da dokar kuma duk wanda aka kama yana karya dokar to fa labudda zasu kama shi 

To sai dai yayin da aka soma aiwatar da wannan doka, yanzu haka wasu kungiyoyin al’umma a jihar sun fara maida martani 

 Muhammad Bello Mustapha na kungiyar ci gaban Taraba ta ya soki matakin soma aiwatar da dokar a wannan lokaci da kasar ke fama da tashe-tashen hankula dake da nasaba da rikicin makiyaya da manoma

Gwamnatin jihar Borno tare da hadin guiwar hukumar raya kasashe ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya  , sun horas da wadansu matasa dari biyu da arba’in da kan sana’oin hannu dabam dabam 


An debi won sama da wata shida ana horas da matasan da suka hada da maza da mata kan wadannan sana’oi da suka hada da dinki, da kaniki da aikin kafinta, da wada da gyaran wayar hannu, da aikin gyaran kwano

Gwamnatin jihar Borno da hukumar rayar kasashen ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya sun kuma mikawa matasan kayan aiki na miliyoyin nairori, daga bisani kuma gwamnan jihar Kashim Shetimma yace za a ba matasan ayyukan yi bisa ga sana’oin da suka koya 

A nata jawabin, wakiliyar Majalisar Dunkin Duniya, Mjihue Yukai ta kalubalin matasan suyi amfani da horon da suka samu Tace nasara ita ce sake yunkurowa duk lokacin da ka durkushe duk da yake ba abu ne mai sauki ba gudanar da rayuwarsu bisa sana’ar da suka koya 

Ko wanne mataki gwamnatin tabi na daukar matasan da aka koyawa sana’a

 Taron neman zaman lafiya tasaro da tattalin arziki 
Rarraba 
Hukumar inganta ma kanta da kananan masana’antu ta Najeriya ta lashi takobin samar da kwararru matakai da zasu inganta rayuwar al'umma 


A taron kwana uku da hukumar ta shiryawa manyan ktocinta da manyan ma’aikatanta, daga jihohi ta da shida na fadin Najeriya, ktan hukumar Dikko Umaru Rada, yace sun shirya taron ne don samar da hanyoyin habbaka tattalin arzikin Najeriya 

Yace babu yadda za a yi tattalin arzikin Najeriya ya habaka, kasa ta ci gaba, idan ba a habaka masana’antu ba, yace mutanen da suka kawo gwamnatin bisa karagar mulki suna son suga tattalin arzikinsu ya ci gaba, suna kuma so suga masana’antunsu sun ci gaba 

Mallam Dikko Umaru Rada yace abinda shugaban kasa zai yiwa talaka kawai ya habbaka tattalin arziki da zai kai ga ci gaban kasa 

Shima a nasa bayanin gwamnan jihar Lalong yace yana da ikinin cewa taron zai inganta rayuwar al’umma musammam matasa wadanda suke da bukatar ayyukan yi

Ga cikakken rahoton Zainab Babaji, daga Jos, Najeriya 

 Rahoton taraon bunkasa masana'antun Najeriya-"
 
Rahoton taraon bunkasa masana'antun Najeriya-"
A jiya ne gwamnatin jihar Borno ta fitar da wata sanarwar inda ta haramta zirga zirga a wadansu hanyoyin dake fadin jihar 


Gwamnatin tace sanarwar zata kama aiki ne nan take daga jiya litinin har zuwa hudu ga watan Fabrairu Sanarwar dai tana dauke da sa hannun kwamishinan ma'aikatar wa labarai da al’adun cikin gida na jihar Borno Bulama da aka aikawa kafofin yada labarai a yammacin jiya 

Sanarwar tace an haramta zirga zirgar dukan motocin hawa ne na fararen hula dakan tashi daga garin Maiduguri zuwa Kwandiga, da Bama zuwa Banki, da kuma daga Banki zuwa garin Bama, sai kuma daga garin Bama har zuwa Goza wanda har zai dangana da birnin Maiduguri 

Har ila yau mabiya wata hanya da ake kira Mulai da ta tashi daga garin Maiduguri da zai gangara har zuwa garin Dambuwa da Goza, nan ma an haramtawa al’umma bin wannan hanyar, har sai rundunar ro ta kammala ayyukan da take yin a kakkabe gyauron ‘yan kungiyar Boko Haram 

Saurari cikakken rahoton Haruna Dauda Bi’u daga Maiduguri 

Nadin da aka yi wa shugaban Najeriya Muhammadu Buhari, a ma yin jagoran yaki da cin hi a nahiyar Afirka, ya janyo suka da yabo daga jama'a da dama 


Bayan da taron kolin Kungiyar Tarayyar Afirka na AU, ya zabi shugaban Najeriya, Muhammadu Buhari a ma yin jagoran yaki da cin hi a nahiyar Afirka, ana ta bayyana ra’ayoyi mabanbanta 

A taronta da ta gudanar a karo na a birnin na kasar Habasha, wanda aka kammala a yau Litinin, kungiyar tata zabi shugaba Buhari a ma yin jagora 

Rahotanni sun ce an zabe shi ne, saboda rawar da ya taka wajen rage ma lar cin hi a Najeriya tun bayan da ya hau mulki 

Koda wasu na ganin akasin hakan, lura da cewa har Najeriyar ba ta tsira daga wannan ma la ba 

Nahiyar Afirka, na fama da ma loli da suka hada da cin hi, wanda aka yi kiyasin cewa ita take janyo koma baya ga yankin 

To sai dai yayin da wasu ke yaba wannan zabi na shugaba Buhari, wasu na nuna akasin hakan 

Saurari wannan rahoto na Hassan Maina Kaina da ya tattauna da masu fashin baki kan dalilan daukar ma yarsu

Kafa Sabuwar Jam'iyya Ce Mafita Ga Najeriya 

Za ku iya son wannan ma
Rahotanni daag jihar Nasarawa da ke arewa maso kiyar Najeriya na cewa wasu mahara sun hallaka shanu sama da a wani hari da suka kai wani yankin jihar 


Akalla shanu wasu mahara suka kashe a kauyen Kadarko da ke karamar hukumar Keana na jihar Nasarawa a arewacin Najeriya 

Rundunar ‘yan sanda jihar ta Nasarawa wacce ta tabbatar da aukuwar harin ta ce, wasu mutane biyu sun bata bayan da suka far wa kauyen, inda suka yi ta harbi akan mai uwa-dawabi 

Wasu ne suka bude wuta akan shanu, hakan ya yi sandin mutuwar shanu , sannan suka samu rauni Inji Kakakin ‘yan sanda jihar ta Nasarawa, Iis 

Ya kuma kara da cewa, wasu mutane shida sun bata a lokacin harin, amma an yi nasarar gano mutum hudu yana mai cewa har yanzu ba a kama kowa ba 

Yanzu dai an fara bincike, amma ba a samu an kama kowa ba Ya kara da cewa 

Rikicin manoma da makiyaya ya haddasa asarar rayuka a wasu sassan Najeriya, musamman a yankunan Taraba da da Pilato da kuma jihar ta Nasarawa 

Lamarin ya kai ga har shugaban Najeriya Muhammadu Buhari ya umurci shugaban ‘yan sandan kasar ya tare a jihar 
Sannan ya kuma gana da shugabannin jihar ta a wani mataki na neman masalaha 
Rahotannin baya bayannan na nuni da cewa gwamnatin tarraya, na duba yiwuwar aike wa da sojoji zuwa yankunan da ake yawan samun rikice-rikice 
Ana duba yiwuwar daukan wannan mataki kamar yadda jaridun Najeriya da dama suka ruwaito, domin a dakile hare-haren da ake zargin wasu gugun mahara ke kai wa a sassan kasar 
Kwamitin da Fadar shugaban Najeriya ya kafa a karkashin jagorin mataimakin shugaban kasa ne ya bayyana yiwuwar tura sojoji zuwa yankunan kamar yadda wasu majiyoyi suka bayyanawa jaridar 
Kwamitin har ila yau na dauke da wasu gwamnoni na Najeriya 
Saurari rahoton Zainab Babaji domin karin bayani
 An Kashe Shanu , Mutum Biyu Sun Bata a Jihar Nasarawa 
 
An Kashe Shanu , Mutum Biyu Sun Bata a Jihar Nasarawa 
Tsohon Gwamnan Jihar Kano, Sanata Rabi'u Musa Kwankwaso ya janye kai ziyara Kano domin gudun aukuwar rikici a jihar 


Rahotanni daga Najeriya na cewa, tsohon gwamnan jihar Kano, Sanata Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso, ya janye shiri na kai ziyara jihar kamar yadda ya shirya 

Tsohon sakataren kwankwaso a zamanin mulki , Injiniya Rabiu Sulaiman Bichine ne, ya bayyana hakan, inda ya ce hakan ya biyo bayan shawarwarin da aka ba shi kamar yadda shafin jaridar ta wallafa a yau 

Sanata Kwankwaso ya bayyana cewa, "Na janye ziyarata zuwa Kano bayan jin shawarwarin ‘yan Najeriya a gida da waje domin kaucewa rikicin siyasa a jihar da ka iya biyo baya 

A ranar Juma’ar da ta gabata ne, kwamishinan ‘yan sanda na jihar, Rabiu Yusuf, ya sanar wa manema labarai cewa, bayanan sirrin da suka tattara, sun nuna cewa wasu geru na yunkurin ta da fitina a yayin ziyarar 

Hakan ya sa ta shawarci tsohon gwamnan ya dage ziyarar zuwa lokacin da lamura za su daidaita

Akwai Barazanar ro Ga Ziyarar Da Kwankwaso Zai Kai Kano – ‘Yan Sanda
Janairu , 
Sarfilu Gumel
Taron Manema Labarai Na Kungiyar Kwankwasiyya 
Rarraba 
Hukumar ‘yan sanda a jihar Kano tace tana kan bakanta cewa, akwai barazanar ro ga ziyarar da tsohon gwamnan jihar Rabiu Musa Kwankwaso ya shirya kaiwa a gobe Talata 


A juma’ar gabata ne, kwamishinan ‘yan sanda na jihar Rabiu Yusuf ya sanar da manema labarai cewa, bayanan sirri da rundunar ta samu na nuni da cewa, wasu geru na yunkuri tada fitina a yayin ziyarar da sanata kwankwaso yace zai kai Kano, hakan ya sa ta shawarci tsohon gwamnan ya dage ziyarar zuwa lokacin da lamura zasu dai-daita 
Sai dai sanatan wanda ya shafe fiye da shekara guda bai je Kano ba, yace ziyarar sa na nan Daram, kamar yadda magoya bayan sa karkashin jagorin tsohon sakataren gwamnatin Kano Rabiu Sulaiman Bichi suka shaidawa manema labarai a karshen mako 
Hakan dai na nuni da cewa, magoya bayan sanata zasu ci gaba da tarbar sa Sai dai taron nasu ya zo dai-dai da gangamin da ita-ma Jam’iyyar reshen Kano kuma a wuri guda a can hanyar Kano zuwa Zariya 
To ko ita jam’iyyar zata janye nata zuwa wani lokaci tunda sanata Rabiu Kwankwason ya yi watsi da shawarar hukumar ‘yan sanda Tambayar Kenan da wakilin Muryar Amurka ya yiwa sakataren Jam’iyyar Alhaji Ibrahim Zakari Sarina

Baya ga kira ga Shugaban Najeriya Muhammadu Buhari ya yar da kwallon mangwaron ya huta da kuda a zabe mai zuwa, wani abu mai janyo takaddama a wasikar da tsohon Shugaban Najeriya Cif ya rubuta a wasikar shi ne batun kafa wani abu mai kama da jam’iyya ko kuma a kalla kungiyar siyasa Tuni wasu masu fassara ke ganin ya yi jirwaye ne mai kamar wanka a wani yinkurin na ganin an kafa wata sabuwar jam’iyyar siyasa Hasalima, jaridar ta yanar intanet ta nuna cewa na magana ne a fakaice game da wani shiri na kafa wata jam’iyyar siyasa a karshen wannan wata a Abuja, karkashin tsohon gwamnan

 Alheri Abdu

Rarraba 
Yan Najeriya suna ci gaba da maida martani dangane da wasikar da tsohon shugaban Najeriya ya rubutawa shugaba Muhammadu Buhari Kamar sauran bangarorin kasar, al’ummar yankin kudin Najeriya suma sun maida martani inda wadansu suka goyi baya, wasu kuma suke kushewa tsohon shugaban kasar 

A cikin sanarwar da ta fitar, wata kungiya a birnin Ikko mai suna ta soki tsohon shugaban kasar tare da bayyana cewa, ya bar jaki yana dukan taiki Bisa ga cewar kungiyar, kamata ya yi tsohon shugaban kasar ya dora iko da kuma tafiyar hawainiya da gwamnatin shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ke yi a kan ‘yan majalisar tarayya wadanda kungiyar tace suna watsi da duk wani shirin kasa da shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ke gabatar masu 
Shugaban kungiyar Professa Ishak Akintola yace kungiyarsu bata goyon bayan wannan ma yi na , kuma tana kira gareshi da ya janye wannan wasika da ya rubuta, tare da yin kira ga shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya yi watsi da wannan wasika Ya kuma ya takarar neman shugabi a zaben da za’a a gudanar a shekara ta dubu biyu da goma sha 

Yace, A ganinmu shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya taka rawar gani in banda tarko da ‘yan majalisa ke kafa masa da tuni ya wuce nan, don haka akwai bukatar Buhari ya yi tazarce, domin kuwa sai ya sake dawowa ne zai sami ‘yan majalisa na kwarai da zasu taimaka masa wajen tafiyar da kasa kamar yadda ‘yan Najeriya ke fata 
Akasarin magoya bayan Muhammadu Buhari da Sashen Hausa ya zanta da su a birnin Ikko, sun dora laifin gazawar Muhammadu Buhari kan ‘yan majalisun tarayya da na dattijai, da kuma na wakilai, wadanda akasarinsu ‘yan jam’iyar ne suka sauya sheka ana dab da gudanar da zabe, wanda kuma har yanzu ana ganin angulu da kan zabo ne suka yiwa jam’iyar ta 

Wani mai sharhi kan lamura, Alhaji Ado Dansudu ya bayyana cewa, ko ba komi, shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya tsufa saboda haka kamata ya yi ya zama uban kasa ya koma gefe ya sa ido, inda yaga ana bukatar gyara yace a gyara

 A Bauchi Wasu Sun Mayar da Martani Akan Furucin '"
 
A Bauchi Wasu Sun Mayar da Martani Akan Furucin '"
Makon jiya ne cutar zazzabin lassa ta barke a jihar Ebonyi inda ta yi sanadiyar mutuwar mutane hudu da suka hada da likitoci biyu lamarin da ya sa gwamnatin jihar ta rufe duk makarantunta har sai da ta ftacesu, jami'an kiwon lafiya kuma suka tabbatar mata babu wani sabon kamu
 
Gwamnatin jihar Eboyin ta ce an samu gagarumin ci gaba a yunkurin dakile cutar zazzabin Lassa wadda ya yi sanadiyar mutuwar mutane hudu da suka hada da likitoci biyu a makon jiya 

Gwamnatin, yanzu ta bada umurnin sake bude makarantun da aka rufe sanadiyar barkewar cutar a duk fadin jihar Uzor dake magana da yawun gwamnatin jihar ya shaidawa Muryar Amurka hakan yau Laraba 
Mr Uzor ya ce an rufe makarantun ne domin baiwa jami'an kiwon lafiya na jiha da na tarayya damar ftace harabobinsu da sinadirai masu kashe kwayoyin cuta Bayan an ftacesu ne kwararru suka bada shawarar a sake bude makarantun 
Akan kokarin da gwamnatin jihar ke yi na tabbatar da cewa ba'a sake samun barkewar cutar ba, kakakin gwamnati ya ce bayan barkewar cutar gwamnati ta gano cewa dan kwangilan da ta ba cibiyar binciken cututtuka bai kammala ba sai ta kafa kwamitin bincike lamarin da ya kaiga dawo da dan kwangilar har sai da ya cika cibiyar da kayan aiki 
A cewar Uzor yanzu an samu saukin cutar saboda babu wani sabon rahoton cewa wani ya kamu da ita Kazalika hukumomin kiwon lafiya na ci gaba da binciken kwakwaf akan mutane da ake zaton watakila suna dauke da kwayar cutar Amma naurorin gwaji sun nuna mutane cikinsu basa dauke da kwayar cutar 
A wani taron hadin gwuiwa kanin shugabannin ron Najeriya da ministan cikin gida Janar Abulrahman Dambazzau, da Jakadan Amurka a Najeriya da aka yi a Abuja, bangarorin biyu sun jaddada muhimmin ro domin kasar ta samu cikakken zaman lafiya 

Jakadan Amurka a Najeriya,   Symington, ya ce ron Najeriya da ci gaba da kasewa kasa daya, na da mahimmi kwarai a nahiyar Afirka 

Symington ya bayyana hakan ne, yayin wani taron hadin gwuiwa kanin Amurka da Najeriya a Abuja 

Jakadan Amurkan ya ce ya yi farin cikin ganin yadda shugabannin rundunonin ron kasar suka hadu wuri guda domin tattauna sha'anin ro 

A cewar Symington, Amurka za ta tallafawa Najeriya da irin dabarun da ta bi ta samu nasara domin ita ma Najeriya ta kai wannan mataki 

Ana shi bangaren, Janar Dambazzau mai ritaya, ya ce ro da zaman lafiya su ne abubuwan da gwamnatinsu ta sa a gaba saboda haka samun nasarar shirin zai ta'allaka ne a hannunsu gaba daya

Gwamnatin jihar Taraba, daya daga cikin jihohin da suka kafa dokar hana kiwo a Najeriya tace ba gudu ba jada baya wajen soma aiwatar da wannan dokar duk da korafe-korafen da ake yi game da wannan sabuwar doka 
Rahotanni dai sun bayyana cewa gwamnatin jihar tuni ma ta dauki zaratan jami’an hana kiwon da za’a yiwa lakabi da yan , kuma an dauko goma-goma daga matakan mazabun anguwanni wato wod-wod da suka kai dubu daya, inda za’a basu horo na musamman kafin bazasu a kananan hukumomin jihar goma sha shida 
Da yake karin haske ga manema labarai bayan wani taron sirri da sarakunan gargajiyan jihar, mataimakin Gwamnan jihar Taraban, Haruna Manu, yace dokar da zata soma aiki daga wannan rana ta ga watan Janairu kuma ya samu amincewar sarakunan gargajiya, yayin da za’a soma aiwatarwa daki-daki 
Hon Ibrahim Bappa Waziri tsohon jami’in ro ne kuma tsohon dan majalisar dokoki, yace kafin kafa irin wannan dokar akwai matakan da ya kamata a dauka Kamar Bappa Waziri shima wani masanin Dokta Agoso Bamaiyi, yace ai wasu dokokin da ake fadi na burtali ko hurumin dabbobi, akwai bukatar duba su don tafiya da zamani

ya kara da cewa wannan shirin shekaru uku zai taimakawa gwamnatin jihar Borno, saboda ba zata iya ci gaba da bada taimako na won loakci ba Ya amsa tambaya a kan rashin ro da ake fama da shi a wasu yankuna da yanda zai shafi shirin nasu, inda ya kyautata zaton cewa akwai abubuwan da zau iya yi su kula da yanda suke gudanar da ayyukansu

Tsohon shugaban Najeriya ya ce shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya gaza wajen kawar da ma lolin Najeriya, yana mai cewa lokaci ya yi da zai je ya huta 
 wanda ya bayyana hakan a wata doguwar rubutacciyar sanarwa da ya raba wa manema labarai, ya kara da cewa, manyan jam’iyun kasar guda biyu, wato da sun gaza, saboda haka a kafa wata sabuwar hadaka, wacce za ta kunshi kowa da kowa mai suna 
Muna bukatar wata hadaka, wacce za a kira ta , hadakar da za ta zama jam’iya ta siyasa a daidai wannan lokaci, wacce za ta kunshi dukkanin ‘yan Najeriya na gari 
Ya kara da cewa Idan har aka kai matakin da jam’iyar za ta fitar da dan takara, ni zan ja gefe na ci gaba da zama wanda baya mu’amulla da siyasa kai- ye, ya kamata a bude hedkwatar wannan hadaka a Abuja

Koda ya ke, ya yabi irin kokarin da Buhari ya yi, a fagen yaki da ta’addi da kuma cin hi da rashawa, amma ya ce har yanzu "akwai rina a kaba a wadannan fannonin

Gwamnan jihar Ekiti Ayodele Fayose yace dokar hana yawo da dabbobi a cikin jihar na nan daram Yace an samar da dokar ce ba domin rukunin wasu mutane ba,amma ga dukkan 'yan jihar 

 
Yayin da ake kai ruwa rana game da samarwa makiyaya wurin kiwo a cikin jihohin Najeriya, Gwamnan jihar Ekiti Ayodele Fayose yace dokar da ya kafa na hana kiwo barkatai nan nan daram 

Gwammnan ya furta hakan ne sailin da yake tattaunawa da wakilin sashen Hausa na Muryar Amurka, Hassan Umaru Tambuwal ta wayar tarho 

Fayose yace daya daga cikin abinda yayi game da wannan dokar ya tabbatar kowa nada rawar da zai taka game da wannan dokar, domin samun nasarar taga kowa da kowa 

Yace ya kafa dokar ce ba tare da j sai wani ko wasu sun mutu ba kafin ace a samar da doka, kuma wannan dokar ba anyi ta bane domin wasu rukunin jamaa sai domin masu aikata ayyukan assha koda kuwa da wani irin harshe suke magana

A dai-dai lokacin da mutane ke komawa garuruwan su na asali a tarayyar Najeriya biyo bayan nasarar da aka samu da yaki da Boko Haram, gwamnatin tarayya tace zata kyautata yanayi a wadannan yankunan da wannan lamari ya shafa domin mutanen wadannan wuraren su samu natsuwa 
Mutanen dai sun jima cikin damuwa na hasarar da suka yi ta ‘yan uwansu da dukiyoyin su abinda yasa gwamnatin tace wajibi ne ta kyautata rayuwar su musammam ma wajen samar musu ababen more rayuwa

A karon farko, hukumomin ron Najeriya, sun tabbatar da kasewar mayakan reshen yammacin Afirka, wato ISWA a kasar, bayan wani bincike da suka gudanar sanadiyar rikice-rikicen da ke faruwa a wasu sassan kasar 


Wani rahoto da hukumomin ron Najeriya suka gabatar wa shugaba Muhammadu Buhari, ya yi nuni da cewa ‘yan kungiyar reshen yammcin Afirka ISWA ne suka kai wasu hare-haren da suka auku a wasu sassan kasar a ‘yan kwanakin nan 
Daga cikin hukumomin ron da suka tabbatar da hakan, har da hukumar ro ta farin kaya, wato 
Mutane da dama ne suka rasa rayukansu a sassan Najeriya, musamman a kiyar arewacin kasar 
Jihohin da Taraba na daga cikin inda aka yi wadannan kashe-kashen, wadanda ake dangantawa da rikicin manoma da makiyaya 
A makon da ya gabata hukumomin ro sun cafke mahara da dama wadanda ake zargin su da kai wadannan hare-hare 
Daga cikin wadanda aka kama akwai mayakan Fulani da mayaka na sa-kai da gwamnati ke marawa baya da kuma sauran geru masu ta da zaune- ye, kamar yadda jaridun Najeriya suka ruwaito 
Rahoton kamar yadda shafin yanar gizon jaridar ya wallafa, ya bayyana cewa kungiyar ta ISWA na daukan mayakan matasa domin kai hare-hare, da nufin haddasa fitina a kanin kabilu da mabiya addinai daban-daban 
An gabatar wa da shugaba Buhari wannan rahoton ne bayan rikicin jihar da sauran jihohi da suka kai ga salwantar da rayuka 
Wannan shi ne karon farko da hukumomin ron Najeriya, suka sanar a hukume, cewa akwai ‘yan kungiyar ta ISWA a kasar, kamar yadda shafin yanar gizon jaridar ya wallafa

Wannan shari’a dai jaddada hukunci ne da babbar kotun tarayya ta jihar Legas ta yanke, da shima ya baiwa hukumar ta gwamnatin Najeriya hurumin kula da lamuran tattalin arziki na bakin teku

Muhammad Modibbo Ali, daya daga cikin wadanda suka rasa yan’uwansu a wannan tashin hankalin, yace kawo yanzu ko kwandala gwamnatin jihar bata basu ba, domin haka ya bukaci gwamnatin jihar da ta duba lamarin da idon rahama 

Shima da yake karin haske, wani mazaunin yankin, Mallam Bello Babni Ja’e yace kawo yanzu kusan mutunen da wannan tashin hankali ya shafa suna cikin halin ban tausayi 

To sai dai kuma a martanin da gwamnan jihar Taraban, Darisu Isiyaku ya maida ta bakin hadimi ta fuskar harkokin yada labarai Bala Dan Abu, ya mu zargin cewa basu da labarin inda aka tsugunar da ‘yan gudun hijira

Karamar hukumar Madagali a jihar Adamawa na fama da harin sari ka noke da 'yan Boko Haram ke yawan kai masu, na baya bayan nan shi ne wanda suka kai kauyen Pallam, lamarin da ya harzuka mayakan sa kai su yiwa 'yan Boko Hrama din kwantan bauna har suka samu kashe biyu 

Rahotanni daga jihar Adamawa a arewa maso gabashin Najeriya na cewa 'yan sa kai na maharba da 'yan banga sun sami nasarar kashe wasu daga cikin 'yan Boko Haram da suka kai hari Pallam dake yankin Madagali a jiya Talata 

To sai dai kuma wannan na zuwa ne yayin da al’ummomin yankin ke yin kuka game da sabbin hare-haren da ake samu a yankin cikin kwanakin nan 

Yanzu haka, ana yawaitar samun harin sari ka noke da ake zargin mayakan Boko Haram na kaiwa a wasu wuraren da aka kwato a yankunan Madagali da Michika cikin 'yan kwanakin nan, lamarin da ke kara tada hankulan al’ummomin da suka koma 

Na baya bayan nan shi ne harin da suka kai garin Pallam dake Madagali inda aka samu asarar rayuka, koda yake daga bisani 'yan sa kai na maharba sun yi musu kwanton-bauna,inda aka kashe wasu daga cikin 'yan Boko Haram,kamar yadda wani dan yankin ke cewa 

To sai dai kuma, wata ma lar da jama’ar yankin ke kokawa a kai ita ce ta rashin kai musu dauki cikin gaggawa daga jami’an ro

Mr Adamu Kamale, dan majalisar wakilai ne dake wakiltar wannan yankin da ake yawaitar kai hare haren Yace su bukatarsu ma ita ce shugaban kasa Buhari ya ziyarce su don gane wa idanuwa halin da suke ciki 

Ga karin bayani a rahoton Ibrahim Abdulaziz 

Kamar yadda 'yan Boko Haram suka sace 'yan matan makarantar sakan ta mata dake Chibok, haka suka sace wasu yara da mata kimanin a yankin Diffa cikin kasar Nijar lamarin da yanzu ya harzuka wasu suka tashi suka kaddamar da kamfen din ceto mutanen da aka sace

 
Mai magana da yawun 'yan rajin ganin an sako 'yan Nijar da Boko Haram ta sace, Kaka Touda, ya ce ranar ga watan Satumbar bara 'yan Boko Haram sun sako biyu cikin mutanen da suka sace a Ngalewa, yankin Diffa, amma tun daga lokacin babu labarin sauran dake hannunsu 

A cewarsa su 'yan Boko Haram sun yi bidiyo akan 'yan matan Chibok da suka sace domin duk duniya ta tabbatar sun sace su amma basu yi haka ba akan na Nijar da suka sace Rashin sanin halin da sauran ke ciki ya sa suka fito su soma fafutikar ganin an sako su 

Inji Kaka Touda zasu yi amfani da duk kafofin labarai har da na zamani su wayar da kawunan mutane akan lamarin, tare da k shugabanni su tashi ye akan lamarin Ya kira shugabannin kasar da manyan mutane su soma magana akan wadanda aka sace kamar yadda kungiyar, ta Najeriya keyi 

Akan cewa ba'a tunawa da mutanen saboda ba'a ambatarsu, Kaka ya ce sau daya shugaban kasa ya ambacesu a wani jawabi da ya yi inda ya umurni jami'an ro da su tabbatar sun zakulo mutanen da aka sace tare da wadanda suka yi aika aikar A cewarsa yau kwanaki dari biyu ke nan da sace mutanen kuma babu labarinsu 

Ga rahoton Souley Barma da karin bayani


A kauyen da ya fi ko ina sanyi a duniya, girar mutum tana daskarewa ta zamo kankara, abinci na zamowa kankara, yayin da numfashi ke daskarewa da zarar ya fita daga hin mutum 

, 
A kauyen Oymyakon mai mutane a yankin Yakutia na kasar Rasha, mutane ba su iya kashe motarsu ko da ba su amfani da ita a saboda baturinta na iya mutuwa kwata-kwata saboda nanin sanyi idan suka kashe motar 

Girar mutum ta kan daskare ta yi kankara daga numfashin da ya fito hin mutum, ko kankara ta taru a gashin baki, duk da cewa kusan ya zamo dole mutum ya rufe ko ina a jiki , har fuska, musamman idan ana iska a lokacin sanyi 

A ranar lahadi da ta shige na'urar auna sanyi da kauyen ya saya ya kafa a cikin gari don duk mai wucewa ya iya ganin irin ma yin sanyin da ake yi, ta lalace ta fashe, a lokacin da awun sanyi ya kai mizani a kasa da mizanin daskarewar ruwa 

A lokacin hunturu a wannan kauye, kwata-kwata awa kacal rana take yi a sama, watau daga fitowarta har zuwa faduwarta Ana zama cikin duhun na won awa 

Irin wannan nanin sanyi yana shafar kowace irin rayuwa ta mutanen wannan yanki Alal ga misali, a lokacin hunturu kamar a yanzu, akasarin abincinsu nama ne, wanda a wani lokacin a daskare suke ci haka, saboda ba a iya shuka komai a kasar wurin wadda take daskarewa ta zamo kamar kankara 

Wasu daga cikin irin wadannan abinci sun hada da wanda suke kira Stroganina, watau kifin da aka fere nama kamar kilishi, amma danye wanda ya daskare ya zama kankara Haka kuma su na cin naman wata dabba dangin barewa da aka fi samu a dazuzzukan wurin da kuma hantar doki da ta daskare ta zamo kamar kankara 

Ba a iya tono a sanya bututun ruwa ko na bahaya a wurin, saboda haka duk wuraren bahaya, dakuna ne kawai ake yi a rufe su a baya ko gefen gidaje 

A lokacin hunturu, mutane ba su iya aiki na lokaci mai wo a waje, sai dai su yi kamar mintoci , sai su koma ciki, bayan kamar awa daya su sake fitowa su yi minti 

Wannan kauye na Oymyakon a shekarun da ya kase zango na makiyayan bareyi dake yawa don shayar da dabbobinsu a saboda akwai wata mabubbugar ruwan zafi da bakinta ba ya daskarewa a wurin 

Idan aka yi rasuwa a wannan kauyen, sai an samu wuta an hura an gasa inda za a tona kabari kafin a iya samun sukunin binne mutum
