Kauyen Oymyakon Yafi Ko  Wuri Da Bil Adama Ke Zaune A Duniya Sanyi

A ziyarar aiki da ta kai shi Kano, Ministan Shari'ar Najeriya, Abubakar Malami, ya amince da sakin wasu furusinoni kusan dari hudu dake gidan kaso a Kano abun da masana harkokin shari'a suka yi na'am da shi amma suka ce hakan ba zai yi wani tasiri ba idan ba'a dauki wasu matakai ba 

, 
Gwamnatin Najeriya tayi afuwa ga wasu daurarru guda dake re a gidan yari na Kurmawa dake Kano, a wani mataki na rage cunkoso a gidajen yarin kasar 

Sai dai masana dokoki da shari’a sun ce akwai bukatar gwamnati ta dauki wasu karin matakai domin mage ma lar cunkoso a gidajen kurkuku na Najeriya da kuma kiyaye aikata laifuffuka a cikin al’umma 

A yayin ziyarar aiki a Kano, babban atoni janar kuma ministan shari’a na tarayyar Najeriya, Abubakar Malami, bisa rakiyar shugaba da wakilan kwamitin gwamnatin tarayya kan rage cunkoso a gidajen yarin Najeriya, ya sanar da matakin yin afuwar ga daurarrun su kimanin 

Wannan dai karo na biyu da gwamnatin tarayyar ke yin afuwa ga daurarru a Kano cikin kasa da watanni biyu da suka shude 

Kodayake masana harkokin shari’a sunyi na’am da wannan yunkuri, amma sun ce ba zai yi tasirin da ake muradi ba na rage cunkoso a gidajen yari a Najeriya, kamar yadda tsohon magatakardan babbar kotun Kano, ister Abdullahi Sufi, ke fadi Yana cewa akwai abubuwan da ya kamata a duba domin a rage cunkoso a gidajen kaso Wadandan ko su ne harkokin alkalai, 'yan sanda, ma'aikatan shari'a da mutanen gari Akwai bukatar a wasu gidajen kaso 

'Yan sanda na juya maganar da aka kai musu domin su re mutum gidan kaso Alkalai ma na da tasu rawar da suke takawa Inji ister Sufi bincike bai kamata ya dauki wani won lokaci mai yawa ba A ma'aikatar shari'a sai a yi shekara shida zuwa bakwai ba'a samu amsar da ake bukata ba domin shari'a ta ci gaba

Shi kuwa lauyan gwagwarmayar kare hakkin bil’adama a Kano ister Audu Bulama Bukarti cewa yayi matakin ya yi dai-dai da tanadin dokokin kasa, amma akwai bubuwan dubawa dangane da mutanen da za'a sako Ya ce ana iya a samu ma la idan mutaen gari sun ki karbarasu Su kansu mutanen idan sun saba da gidan kaso inda suke samun abinci da wurin kwana ba sai sun biya ba zama cikin jama'a inda sai sun nemi nasu ka iya zama wahala 

A watan disamban da ya shude ne dai shugaba Buhari da ka ya yi afuwa ga wasu daurarru lokacin daya kawo ziyarar aiki Kano 

Haka shi gwamnan Kano Abdullahi Umar Ganduje ya yi afuwa ga daurarru a lokacin bukukuwan sallah babba da aka yi a watannin baya 

Ga rahoton Mahmud Ibrahim Kwari da karin bayani 

Yayinda gwamnonin jihohin arewa na jam'iyyar ke mikawa shugaban kasa tikitin sake yawa zabe a shekarar , sauran jam'iyyu ma suna shirin shiga zaben duk da ikirarin da gwamnan Kaduna Nasiru El-Rufai ya yi na cewa babu wani dan arewa da zai iya yawa da Buhari takara ya kai labari gida

 
A cewar gwamna Nasiru El-Rufai lokaci bai yi ba da shugaban kasa zai ayyana takarar amma kuma su gwamnonin shi suke marawa baya 

Inji Gwamna Nasiru El-Rufai, shugaban kasa ya ce an zabeshi ne ya yiwa kasar aiki har zuwa shekarar , kuma abun da ya sa gaba ke nan Yace lokacin da zai ce zai yi zaben ko ba zai yi ba bai zo ba Gyaran Najeriya ne ya sa a gaba , inji El-Rufai 

Gwamnan Rufai ya ci gaba da cewa wannan zamanin na Buhari ne Babu wani dan arewa da zai tashi a siyase ya fi karfin Buhari sai dai rananar da Buhari ya ce ya daina siyasa 

Amma wani matashin dan siyasa daga Adamawa, Adamu Garba ya kushewa ra'ayin gwamnonin kuma ya kalubali tsoffin 'yan siyasa saboda shi zai ya takarar shugaban kasa Adamun mai shekaru a duniya yanzu ya ce Buhari yana da amana amma bai dauki hanyar gyara Najeriya ba Injishi, haka ma masu shekaru irin nasa basirar gyara ta wuce masu 

Baba Shehuri, karamin ministan ayyuka baya shakkar sake samun nasarar Buhari a zaben saboda shugaba ne da baya sata baya cutar jama'a duk wanda ya yi takara da shi zai fadi sai dai idan talakawa ne suka yi canji 

Ga Nasiru Adamu da karin bayani

, 
Mutane akalla sun mutu yau laraba a lokacin wasu hare-haren kunar-bakin-wake a garin Maiduguri dake yankin arewa maso gabashin Najeriya 

Wata majiyar 'yan sanda ta ce mutane ne suka mutu a wannan lamarin tare da jikata wasu da yanzu suke asibitoci daban daban 

Shaidu dake wurin sun ce mutane hudu ne suka kai hari kuma akwai akalla mace daya cikin maharan 

Hukumar bayar da agajin gaggawa ta Najeriya, NEMA, ta fada cikin wata sanarwar da jami'in yada labaranta na yankin arewa maso gabas, Abdulkadir Ibrahim, ya bayar cewa mutane sun ji rauni a wannan lamarin da ya faru da misalin karfe da minti na yammacin yau 

Babu watanda ya dauki alhakin kai wannan harin, amma kuma bangaren Abubakar Shekau na kungiyar Boko Haram ta sha daukar alhakin kai hare-haren kunar-bakin-wake a wannan unguwa ta Muna dake Maiduguri 

Da zara mun samu karin bayani zamu sanar da ku

An kuma kashe 'yan sanda biyu dake rakiya ma wadannan Amurkawa biyu da 'yan kasar su biyu wadanda su ma aka sace su a wani wurin dake cikin karamar hukumar Kagarko a kan wannan hanya

, 
'Yan bindiga sun sace Amurkawa biyu da wasu 'yan kasar su biyu a cikin Jihar Kaduna dake yankin kiyar Najeriya 

Wani kakakin rundunar 'yan sanda ya fadawa cewa an kuma kashe jami'an 'yan sanda biyu da suke rakiya ma wadannan turawa dake kan hanyar komawa Abuja daga garin Kafhan 

Kakakin 'yan sandan na Jihar Kaduna, Mukhtar Aliyu, yace "'yan sanda biyu dake reakiya ma turawan, sun yi musanyar wuta da masu sace mutanen na won lokaci, abinda ya kai har suka rasa rayukansu 

Wakilin Muryar Amurka, Nasiru Yakubu, yace 'yan bindigar sun tare hanya suka sace mutanen ne a kanin Jere da Kargo, a kan wannan hanya da a yanzu ta yi kaurin suna wajen fashi da satar mutane 

A shekarar da ta shige ma, an sace wani bature dan kasar Jamus a wannan hanya 

Haka kuma a daidai wannan wurin ne a 'yan watannin baya aka sace tsohon ministan wasanni na Najeriya, Damishi Sango, wanda shi ma yake kan hanyarsa ta zuwa Abuja 


A taron majalisar zartaswar Najeriya na mako mako da ministoci ke yi kowace ranar Laraba, yau ta dauki wasu muhimman matakan inganta wutar lanta da ruwan sha da ma ruwan yin noman rani

 
Yau majalisar zartaswa ta Najeriya a karkashin jagorin shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ta dauki wasu muhimman matakan da zasu kaiga inganta samar da wutar lanta da samar da wadataccen ruwan sha da na aikin noma 

Bayan taron gwamnati ta bada sanarwar daukan kwararan matakan domin tabbatar da cewa an inganta wutar lanta, da ruwan sha da ruwan noma ta hanyar inganta madatsun ruwa a kasar 

Kazalika gwamnatin ta dauki matakan inganta ro da kare haduran jiragen sama 

Ministan albarkatun ruwa Suleiman Adamu Kazaure ya bayyana matakan da gwamnati za ta dauka Ya ce kodayake ana samar da wutar lanta kusan kilowat dubu bakwai amma saboda matasalar layin kebul dubu biyar kawai ake rabawa mutane, ke nan ana hasarar dubu biyu kowace rana kuma dole ne gwamnatin tarayya ta biya kudinsu Gwamnati zata fito da wani ri da zai inganta abunda ake ba jama'a ta hanyar kara bada kashi na hannun jarin kamfanonin dake raba wuta yayinda su 'yan kasuwa dake da kashi zasu kara nasu kason 

Ta fuskar ruwan sha zasu inganta madatsun ruwa tare da wasu sabbi 

Shi ma Sanata Hadi Sirika ministan sufurin jiragen sama ya bayyana cewa za'a sayi sabuwar naurar dake tante dalilin hadarin jirgin sama saboda wadda kasar ke anfani da ita tsohuwa ce kuma ta kone 

Ga rahoton Umar Faruk Musa da karin bayani 


, 
Majalisar zartaswar tarayyar Najeriya ta dauki muhimman matakan da zai kai ga inganta samar da wutar lanta da kuma samar da wadataccen ruwan sha da na noma 

Bayanda majalisar ta kammala taronta na mako mako karkashin jagorin shugaba Muhammadu Buhari, gwamnatin ta bada sanarwar cewa zata dauki mataki mai kwarin gaske domin tabbatar da cewa an sami ingi a fannin harkokin ro a kasar da kuma kare haduran sufurin sama kamar yadda yake a sauran kasashen duniya 

A fannin samar da wutar lanta, ministan albarkatun ruwa Suleiman Adamu Kazaure ya bayyana cewa, gwamnatin tarayya zata fito da wani ri da za a kara inganta hanyoyin samar da wuta, bisa ga cewarshi, za a duba kamfanonin da ba zasu iya samar da wuta yadda ya kamata ba, sai gwamnati ta nemi hanyar da zata shiga ciki 

A nasa bangaren, ministan harkokin sufurin sama Saneta Hadi Sirika yace gwamnatia zata sayi sabuwar na’urar tante dalilin hadura irin na zamani domin inganta harkokin sufurin jiragen sama 

Ga dai rahoton da wakilinmu Umar Faruk Musa ya aiko daga Abuja

Kungiyar dake kula da harkokin majalisu, CISLAC, da hukumar dake kula da 'yan gudun hijira, ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya da gwamnatin suka shirya taron fadakar da 'yan jarida da wasu akan hakkin 'yan gudun hijira a Yola babban birnin jihar Adamawa

 
Yayin dai wannan taron tuntuba da cibiyar sa ido kan harkokin majalisu, tare da hadin gwuiwar hukumar kula da yan gudun hijira ta Majalisar dinkin duniya,UN da kuma ofishin jakadin kasar suka shirya ,an gayyato wakilan kafofin yada labarai daban daban da sauran masu ruwa da ki da zummar duba hanyoyin tabbatar da dokar kula da hakkokin yan gudun hijira 

Haka nan mahalarta taron sun yi dubi game da ma lolin rashin samun cikakkun bayanai daga hukumomin da nauyin kula da yan gudun hijira ya rataya a wuyansu,musamman idan ya shafi badakala,ko kuma cin zarafi 

Mr Okeke Anya dake zama daraktan sha’anin harkokin gwamnati na cibiyar ta ya ce rashin samar da dokoki,da kuma bayanai na cikin ma lolin dake hana ruwa gudu,na mage wasu ma lolin da yan gudun hijira ke fuskanta 

‘’ Wannan nauyi ne da ya rataya akan kungiyoyi da ku yan jarida domin tabbatar da dokar da kuma sanin halin da ‘yan gudun hijira ke ciki Dole a hada hannu don haka ta cimma ruwa 

Ya zuwa yanzu dai tuni aka kafa dokar samun bayanai ta ,to amma kuma duk da wannan doka ba kasafai kwalliya kan biya kudin sabulu ba To ko me kungiyar yan jarida zata yi musamman kan batutuwan da suka jibi ‘yan gudun hijira Mallam Umar Dankano,mataimakin shugaban kungiyar yan jarida ta NUJ a jihar Adamawa na cikin mahalarta taron ya ce, zasu tashi ye 

Cibiyoyin kiwon lafiya,suma akwai rawar da ya kamata suna takawa wajen tallafawa ‘yan gudun hijira To ko anya suna yi kuwa Mallam Adamu Dodo jami’in hulda da jama’a ne na asibitin gwamnatin tarayya dake Yola,wato FMC, ya bayyana irin kokarin da suke yi 

Yanzu haka baya ga rikicin Boko Haram wata ma lar dake jawo yawaitar ‘yan gudun hijira a Najeriya ita ce ta tashe tashen hankulan da ake fama dasu a yanzu,batun da mahukunta ke cewa suna nasu kokari 

Wasu da ake kyautata zaton 'yan Boko Haram ne sun kai hari a barikin Tumur dake Diffa a jamhuriyar Nijar kuma sun kashe sojoji hudu, sun jikata takwas da wani ma'aikaci, sun kone wurare da dama sun kuma yi awon gaba da motocin sojoji da makamai

 
Bayanai daga yankin Diffa a Jamhuriyar Nijar na cewa da faduwar rana jiya Laraba wasu 'yan bindiga da ake kyautata zaton 'yan kungiyar Boko Haram ne suka kai hari kan barikin sojan Tumur 

An shafe lokaci mai wo ana bata-kashi kanin sojojin barikin da 'yan bindigan kafin 'yan bindigan su juya su koma inda suka fito 

Wani Manmadu Kaka Tuda, mazaunin garin, ya yiwa Muryar Amurka bayani akan lamarin Ya ce abun asha shi ne 'yan bindigan sun kashe sojoji hudu Sun jikata mutane tara, takwas cikinsu sojoji ne dayan kuma ma'aikacin jinya ne Mutane taran suna asibitin Diffa 

Baicin wannan harin 'yan bindigan, inji Kaka Tuda, sun kone ma'aikatar kansiloli kuma sun kone wani wurin a barikin sojojin Diffan 'Yan bindigan sun yi awan gaba da wasu motocin sojoji da makamai 

Kawo yanzu gwamnatin kasar Nijar ba ta ce komi ba Shi ma gwamnan jihar Diffa Dandano Muhammad da Muryar Amurka ta tuntuba ya bukaci a yi hakuri har zuwa karfe biyar zuwa shida na yammacin yau Alhamis 

A bayan barazanar wannan kungiya cewar ba a cika alkawuran da aka yi mata ba, rundunar sojojin Najeriya dake yankin ta ce kungiyar ba ta fi karfin hukuma ba

 
Kungiyar 'yan bindigarda ake kira wadda ta yi kaurin suna wajen kai hare hare kan bututun mai da kamfanonin dake hakar danyen mai a yankin ta yi barazanar komawa kai hare hare akan bututan mai 

Kungiyar ta bayyana hakan ne a wata sanarwa da ta aikawa manema labarai mai dauke da sa hannun wani da ya kira ka Janar Maduch Abinebu Sanarwar ta ce babu wani saurarawa kuma da zata yi Ta sha alwashin nanta kai hare hare cikin 'yan kwanaki masu zuwa a sassa daban daban inda ake hakan danyen mai Bugu da kari kungiyar ta ce ta yi watsi da duk wani sulhu da gwamnatin tarayyar Najeriya 

A sanarwar kungiyar ta kara da cewa zata fito da wasu sabbin dabarun zamani domin fadada hare harenta kan kamfanonin ayyukan mai 

Mai magana da yawun rundunar sojin dake kula da yankin Manjo Ibrahim Abdullahi ya ce barazanar ba wata sabuwar abu ba ce Ya ce kowa na iya zuwa yanar gizo ya fadin abun da yake so Wanda ma ya fitar da sanarwar ba'a sanshi ba Injishi, jami'ansu suna koina a yankin saboda tabbatar da ro Manjo Ibrahim Abdullahi ya kara da cewa a yadda suke babu abun da ya fi karfinsu Ya roki jama'ar yankin su dinga taimaka masu da bayanan sirri domin inganta ro 

Yayinda kungiyar ta ja kunnuwan kamfanonin mai dake aiki a yankin, wani dan yankin ya ce idan 'yan kungiyar suna aikata ta'addi ita ma gwamnati tarayyar Najeriya tana da laifi kasewa ta hada kai da kamfanonin dake hakan mai wajen bata masu muhallansu Inishi bai kamata a saurari 'yan kungiyar ba saboda yin hakan bashi da amfani 


Shugabannin addinai da masu ruwa da ki a Najeriya suna wani babban taro a Abuja da ake sa ran zai samo hanyar mage rikice-rikice da banbe banben da yake kai ga rikicin makiyaya da manoma a kasar 

 
Taron da za a kwashe kwanaki hudu ana gudanarwa ya samu halartan manyan mutane daga Jihohi har da Abuja ciki har da San Musulmi Sa’ad Abubakar da shugaban Kungiyar Kiristocin ta CAN, Ayo Kunle da sauran wasu masu fada a ji a Najeriya 

Ustaz Muhammad Nurudin Lemo, yana cikin mahalartan taron kuma ya fadawa wakiliyar Muryar Amurka cewa kafin a cimma burin da aka sa a gaba, sai an kawar da rashin gaskiya kanin manyan malamai Yace ya kamata mutanen da ake g mawa ta bangaren addini su tabbatar da ganin an yi adalci a duk lokacin da irin wadannan ma loli suka taso 

Da yake karin haske a cikin kasidarsa da ta mai da hankali a kan kauna, babban mai jawabi a wurin taron daga jami’ar Ahmadu Bello Zaria, Kantiyok yace rashin wayewa da rashin fadin gaskiya su ne suke haddasa rikicin addini 

Wannan taron da aka shirya a kan zaman lafiya da kaunar juna bai bar mata a baya ba Maryam Ibrahim Dada na cikin matan da suka halarcin taron kuma ta yi tsokaci a kan muhimmin taron 

Rundunar ‘yan sandan Najeriya ta cafke wasu mutane goma sha biyu, a ciki har da hakimin Gurmana, Alhaji Aliyu Umar bisa zarginsu da zama muggan masu garkuwa da mutane da kuma satar shanu a jihar Neja 

 
‘Yan sandan sun kama basaraken ne da sauran mutanen a cikin wata musayar wutar da tayi sanadiyar raunata wani dan sanda guda Kwamishinan ‘yan sandan jihar Neja D P Yakadi yace sun samu makamai da dama, ciki har da bindiga kirar AK a hannun mutanen 

Kwamishinan ‘yan sandan Nejan yace sun dade suna fama da ta’addi a yankin Alawa da Kagara da sauran wurare a cikin jihar Yace yanzu ne suka samu nasarar kama wadannan mutane kuma suna gudanar da bincike a kansu 

Kungiyar Miyeti Allah ta yi marhaba da kama wadannan mutane kuma tayi kira da a tabbatar da gaskiya kamar yanda shugaban kungiyar na kasa Alhaji Husseini Boso ya fadawa wakilinmu Mustapha Nasiru Ba ri a birnin Minna 

Wasu mutanen yankin Gurmana dake cikin wani yanayi na rudani a kan wannan al’amari, sun nemi a sakaya sunayensu yayinda suke zantawa da Muryar Amurka 

Kungiyoyin fafatuka a Najeriya sun yi kira da a gaggauta tabbatar da daftarin shirin kasa a kan yan gudun hijira na cikin gida wato don ya zama doka ta yadda za’a mage ma lolin da ‘yan gudun hij ke huskanta 

 
Kungiyoyin sun bayyana wannan bukatar ne a wajen wani taron tuntuba da Cibiyar Sa-ido Kan Harkokin Majalisu tare da hadin gwiwar Hukumar Kula Da ‘Yan Gudun Hijira ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya UN da kuma ofishin jakadin kasar suka shirya 

Haka kuma mahalarta taron sun yi dubi game da ma lolin rashin samun cikakkun bayanai daga hukumomin da nauyin kula da ‘yan gudun hijira ya rataya a wuyansu, musamman idan ya shafi badakala ko kuma cin zarafi 

Mr Okeke Anya dake zama Daraktan Sha’anin Harkokin Gwamnati na Cibiyar ta CISLAC, yace rashin samar da dokoki da kuma bayanai na cikin kalubalan dake hana ruwa gudu na mage wasu ma lolin da ‘yan gudun hijira ke huskanta 


Rahotanni daga jihar Adamawa arewa maso gabashin Najeriya na cewa mayakan Boko Haram sun sake kai wani sabon hari a yankin Madagali dake arewacin jihar, inda aka samu asarar rayuka biyar tare da jikkata wasu 

 
Wannan sabon hari na zuwa ne kasa da kwanaki biyu da harin da aka kai a garin Pallam dake karamar hukumar ta Madagali dake arewacin jihar Adamawa, daya daga cikin jihohin da bala'in Boko Haram ya fi shafa a Najeriya 

Shaidun gani da ido dai sun ce an kai wannan harin a kauyen Kaya dake da tazarar kilomita guda daga Gulak shedikwatar karamar hukumar Madagali Shima da yake karin haske akan wannan hari, dan majalisar wakilai da ke wakiltar Madagali da Michika, Mista Adamu Kamale, yace al’ummar yankin na cikin zaman dar-dar a yanzu 

Lamarin da dan majalisar wakilan yace ana bukatar kai musu dauki Kawo yanzu hukumomin ro a jihar Adamawan ba su yi karin haske ba tukunna, yayin da wasu al’ummar yankin suka soma tunanin sake yin wani sabon gudun hijirar 

Ga rahoton Ibrahim Abdulaziz da karin bayani

An kaddamar da aikin yiwa shanu fiye da miliyan biyu da dubu dari biyar rigakafin cututtuka a kauyen Pogu da ke kusa da Minna babban birnin jihar Neja 

 
Za'a yiwa shanu sama da miliyan biyu da dubu dari biyar rigakafin cututtuka a kauyen Pogu da ke kusa da birnin Minna ta Jihar Neja, kamar yadda Kwamishanan kula da harkokin dabbobi da gandun daji Alhaji Haruna Nuhu Dukku ya bayyana a wajen kaddamar da wannan shirin rigakafi 

Kwamishanan kula da harkokin dabbobi da gandun dajin ya kaddamar da shirin Yace wannan shirin ragakafin cututtuka kyauta ne a duka fadin jihar, ya kuma yi kira ga Fulani da su ja kunnuwan 'ya'yansu da su zauna lafiya da manoma 

 Adamu Ibrahim Katu, likitan dabbobi a ma'aikatar da ke kula da harkokin dabbobin yayi karin haske akan allurar rigakafin Allurar da suke yiwa shanun ta kiyaye ciwon huhunsu ce saboda ciwon yana kashe shanu da zarar sun kaamui 

Makiyayan kuma sun ce suna cikin wani halin farin ciki da allurar rigakafin Muhammad Tukur Abubakar san Fulani a wata karamar hukuma kuma shugaban Miyetti Allah 'Kaotal Hore'reshen jihar Neja yace rigakafin na da anfani saboda lokacin da aka daina yi ne cututtukan suka yawaita 

Shima mataimakin shugaban Miyetti Allah na kasa Alhaji Boso, kira yayi ga makiyaya da su ci gajiyar alherin da gwamnati ta kawo masu da tabbatar da cewa sun kai shanunsu anyi masu allurar 

Babban daraktan kula da harkokin makiyaya a ofishin gwamnan jihar Ardo Abdullahi Adamu Babaye yace, gwamnatin jihar tana daukar matakan kyautatawa makiyaya domin mage ma lolin da ake samu a bangaren Fulanin 


Sakamakon rashin jituwa kanin makiyaya da manoma a jihohin Adamawa, Taraba, Binuwai da ma wasu, ya sa hankalin shugaban kasa ya koma akan lalubo bakin zaren ma lar da zummar samun zaman lafiya mai dorewa a duk fadin kasar

 
Hankalin fadar shugaban Najeriya ya koma kan neman bakin zaren warware asarar rayuka sakamakon rashin jituwa kanin Fulani makiyaya da manoma musamman a jihohin Binuwai, Taraba da Adamawa 

Gwamnatin Najeriya da ta tura baban sifeton 'yan sanda Ibrahim Iis zuwa Bnuwai don kwantar da tashin hankalin da ya kunno kai, ta kuma dauki matakin kawo masalaha ta hanyar kafa gandun dajin kiwon shanu a jihohin da lamarin ya shafa 

Gwamnan Binuwai da ya jagori shugabannin siyasa da na gargajiya na jiharsa har suka gana da Shugaba Buhari ya ce bai goyi bayan kafa gandun daji ba amma makiyaya na iya sayen fili su yi gonakin kiwo Ya ce jiharsa ba ta da kadada dubu goma da za ta bayar Injishi, wasu jihohi masu fili ka iya basu 

Hatta kungiyar Fulani Makiyaya ta Miyetti Allah ba ta ganin kafa gandun shi ne zai zama masalaha mafi ingi fiye da dawo da burtalin shanu na gargajiya ba 

Shugaban kungiyar, Muhammad Kirwa Ardon Zuru ya ce a Najeriya akwai burtalin shanu idan za'a bi burtalin a farfado dashi babu wani Bafillatani da zai dauki shanu daga Sokoto ya nufi Enugu 

Ma la ce ta tilastawa mutum fita da dukiyarsa, injishi A gyara abun da ya rage na burtalin shanun da manoma basu cinye ba, Fulani zasu dawo su zauna saboda sun gaji da wahalar da suke fama da ita Ya ce fadan makiyaya da manoma ya na daukan salo daban daban A wani wurin ya zama tamkar fadan addini kanin Kiristoci da Musulmai, a wani wurin kuma ya zama na kabili 

Ga karin bayani daga rahoton Nasiru Adamu El-Hikaya 

Da safiyar yau Asabar aiyukan gwamnatin Amurka sun ya cak bayan cikar wa'adin kudaden tafiyar da harkokin gwamnati ba tare da cimma daidaituwa ba 

 
Wa’adin gudanar da harkokin gwamnatin Amurka ya cika ba tare da an cimma jituwa kan samar da kudin tafiyar da gwamnati ba 

Da yammacin jiya Juma’a cibiyoyin gwamnatin Amurka suka fara shirye-shiryen dakatar da harkokin gwanatin da basu da muhimmi sosai kafin wa’adin kudaden gudanar da ayyukan gwamnati ya kare karfe goma sha biyun agogon 

Yunkurin Majalisar Dattawa na kada kuri’ar hana dakatar da harkokin gwamnatin ya ci tura A halin yanzu dai ba a san irin tattaunawar da ake yi a bayan fage don shawo kan lamarin ba 

Tun da farko, wata ganawa da aka yi kanin shugaba da jiga-jigan ‘yan jam’iyyar a Majalisar Dattawa ta ka sa kaiwa ga daidaitawa 

Yan Jam’iiyar dake majalisar Dattawa sun ki bada hadin kai saboda su ma a a warware ma lar bakin haure da kuma rin kashe kudi 

Yan na zargin takwarorinsu na da kin mayar da hankalinsu kan abinda yafi muhimmi 

Ana taruka da bukukuwan tunawa da ranar da Sardaunan Sokoto, Ahmadu Bello, ya rasu a sassan Najeriya Sardauna shi ne Firmiyan farko na kuma karshe a yankin arewacin Najeriya 

 
Yau shekaru ke nan da rasuwar Firimiyan yankin arewacin Najeriya, Ahmadu Bello, Sardaunan Sokoto, bayan wani juyin mulki da sojoji suka yi a shekarar 

A Najeriya, musamman a arewaci, akan gudanar da tarurruka a sassan yankin domin yin dubi kan irin rawar da marigayin ya taka wajen hadakan kabilu daban-daban da ke yankin 

Juyin mulkin wanda aka yi a ranar ga watan Janairun ya kuma yi sanadin salwantar rayukan wasu manyan mutane a kasar ciki har da Firai ministan Najeriya na farko Abubakar Tafawa Balewa 

Irin gudunmuwar da Sardauna ya bayar wajen ci gaban yankin arewacin Najeriya ya sa ya zama abin misali da kwaikwayo a sassan yankin 

Tarihi ya nuna cewa Sardauna mutum ne da ba ya nuna wariyar addini ko kabili ko kuma ta yanki 

Wata tambaya da ta fi jan hankulan masharhanta ita ce, shin mene ne ya sa har yanzu Sardauna ke ci gaba da zama abin kwate da zama a zukatan mutane shekaru bayan rasuwarsa 

A wannan rahoto da Murtala Faruk Sanyinna ya aiko daga Sokoto, Farfesa Bello Bada, Malami a jami’ar Usman Dan Fodio da ke Sokoto ya ba da amsar wannan tambaya

Shugaban Najeriya Muhammadu Buhari ya tattauna da shugabannin al’umomin da ke jihar wacce ta ke fama da rikicin manoma da makiyaya 

Mutane da dama ne suka rasa rayukansu a ‘yan makwannin da suka gabata a jihar ta saboda hare-haren daukar fa da aka rika samu a jihar ta 

Daga cikin wadanda shugaban ya gana da su har da shugabannin addinai da sarakunan gargajiya 

Shugaba Buhari ya jajanta wa al’umomin jihar tare da nuna damuwarsa kan wannan fitina Inji Malam Garba Shehu a wata tattauna wa da ya yi ta wayar talho da wakilin Muryar Amurka Umar Faruk Musa 

A cewar Shehu, shugaba Buhari ya fadawa mahalarta taron cewa, duk wani wanda aka samu da laifi wajen wannan kashe-kashe sai an tono an yi maganin shi Hukunci kuma ba bangare guda ba, domin barnar nan duk bangarorin nan ana yi musu ita

Jihar a ‘yan makwannin nan ta sha fama da rikicin manoma da makiyaya inda bangarorin suka rika kai hare-haren daukar fa

Yan Sandan jihar Taraba dake Arewa-maso-gabashin Najeriya sun tabbatar a jiya Litinin cewa dan majalisar dokokin jihar da ya fada hannun masu garkuwa da mutane, Ibi y amutu 

 
Fiye da wata guda ke nan da masu garkuwa da mutane suka sace wannan dan majalisar dokokin yayin da ya ziyarci mahaifiyasa kuma tun daga wan lokacin ne ake ta fafutukar ganin an ceto shi, to amma hakarsu bata cimma ruwa ba 

Tun da farko masu garkuwan sun nemi a basu kudin fa na Naira miliyan dari, kamar yadda wata majiya ta tabbatar 

Rundunan yan sandan jihar Taraban, ta bakin kakakinta Misal, tace an gano gawar dan majalisar ne a wani kauye dake hanyar Kashimbila, wanda kuma kawo yanzu ba wanda aka kama dangane da kisan 

Yanzu haka dai wannan batu ya jefa al’ummar mazabar dan majalisar wato Takum One da ma jihar Taraban cikin wani yanayi na zullumi Hon Bello, tsohon kwamishinan yada labarai ne a jihar kuma dan yankin da dan majalisar da aka kashen ya fito, ya bayyana halin da suka tsinci kansu a yankin 

Yanzu haka dai a Najeriya satar mutane domin neman kudin fa na neman gagaran kundila, yayin da a kullum kuma hukumomin ro ke cewa suna nasu kokari wajen maganace lamarin

Wadannan kananan hafsoshin soja, sun yi ikirarin cewa sun shirya juyin mulkin ne a saboda a cewarsu, shugabannin dake jagorin kasar sun nuna zarmiya, inda suka ce ministocin gwamnati suna sace kudaden baitul-mali domin amfaninsu

Ga Ibrahim Abdulazeez da Karin bayani 

Gwamnatin jihar Nassarawa tace zata ci gaba da taimakawa 'yan gudun hijira, kuma gwamnan yace zai tabbatar sai an inganta matakan ro a yankin da suke

 
Yanzu haka dai dubban ‘yan gudun hijira daga jihar ne suka kwarara zuwa garin Tunga dake cikin karamar hukumar Awe a jihar Nassarawa 

‘Yan gudun hij wadanda yawin su ‘yan kabilar ne da Fulani sukace sun guje wa muhallan su ne domin gudun kar rikicin ya ru dasu 

To sai dai wani abu mai daure kai, ardon ardodin jihar Nassarawa Ardo Lawan Dono, ya shaidawa wakiliyar sashen Hausa Zainab Babaji cewa, ba makiyaya ko manoman na jihar ta ne suka kawo wannan fadan ba Yace wannan yasa suke zaune lafiya da junan su 

Sai dai duk lokacin da irin haka ta faru wannan gari na Tunga yakan cika da jamaa domin yana zama tamkar tudun natsira ne 

Shugaban kungiyar raya al’ummar garin na Tunga Alhaji u Mohammad ya bukaci gewamnati dama masu hannu da shuni da su taimaka musu domin ko kudin kungiyar ya kare wajen agajin da suke baiwa wadannan mutanen dake gudun hijira a garin nasu 

Gwamnan jihar ta Nassarawa yace sun kashe kudi har sama da naira miliya domin agazawa wadannan bayin ALLAH kuma ba zasuyi kasa a gwiwa ba Haka kuma zai tabbatar an inganta matakan ro a wannan yankin 

Yau Talata, Jami’ai da ‘yan sanda a suka kiyasta cewa mutane aka kashe tun ga watan Disemba izuwa yau, sakamakon tashe tashen hankula kanin Fulani makiyaya da manoma 

 
Yau Talata, Jami’ai da ‘yan sanda a Najeriya suka kiyasta cewa mutane aka kashe tun ga watan Disemba ya zuwa yau, sakamakon tashe tashen hankula kanin Fulani makiyaya da manoma 

Mafi yawan tashe tashen hankula kanin manoma da makiyaya akan yin amfani da filaye ne dake yankin , yankin da ya fi ko  mazauna daga bangarorin kasar dabam dabam 

Kamfanin dilin labarum Fara AFP ya ruwaito cewa, Talata shugaba Muhammadu Buhari ya bada umarni a kasra yawan yan sanda a jihar 

Tashe tashen hankulan manoma da makiyaya makamin wannan yana cigaba da aukuwa a jihohin dake kiyar kasar Hakan ya sa ake ta samun rabuwar kawauna kanin kabilu da addinai, wadda ya janyo kalubale ga alkawarin da shugaba Buhari yayi wa al’ummar kasa a lokacin yakin neman zabe din san a shekarar akan samun ro da kwiyar hankali 

A watan Nuwambar da ya gabata, an kashe mazauna yankin makiyaya ciki harda yara a jihar Adamawa dake arewa maso gabashin Najeriya a saboda wata arangama da aka yi 

Kungiyar Izalatul Bidia waikamatus sunna JIBWIS da hadin gwiwar wata kungiyar da ake kira TOLORAM daga kasar suna bada kyautar hannu da kafar roba kyauta a Abuja

 
Kungiyar Izalatul Bidia Waikamatus Sunna JIBWIS da hadin kan wata kungiyar kasar mai suna TOLORAM,suka taimakawa wasu bayin ALLAH masu laluran rashin hannu ko kafa 

Mutane kusan dubu biyu ne wadannan kungiyoyin zasu baiwa hannu ko kafan roba kyauta, wanda aka kiyasta kudin sa a Najeriya yakai naira dubu dari biya ko  guda 

Yayin da kungiyar JIBWIS, ke daukar dawainiyar masu wannan lalurar daga ko ina cikin Najeriya zuwa Abuja kuma su basu wurin kwana da ciyarwa, ita ko kungiyar ta TOLORAM ta kera kafa ko hannu kyauta 

Kungiyar tace duk wani mai wannan lalurar ya tafi ofishin kungiyar ta JIBWIS domin yayi rajista, sabo da samunwannan kyautar 

Malam Usman Funtua dake kula da aikin a madadin kungiyar ta JIBWIS yace tallafin bai ya ga musulmi kawai ba ko kuma wata darika ko kungiya ba, duk wanfda yazo za a bashi kyauta 

Ga Nasir Adamu El-Hikaya da Karin bayani

Hukumar Zabe mai zaman kanta na tace tayi wa mutane dubu casain rajista a jihar 

 
Hukumar zaben mai zaman kanta a jihar tace mutane dayawan su yakai dubu casain da hudu tayi wa rajista a jihar 

Sai dai wasu yan jihar sun bayyana rashin gamsuwar su da wannan adadin dama yadda hukumar ke tafiyar da ayyukanta 

Mai Magana da yawun huumar a jihar ta Madawaki Wase ya jaddada wannan adadin kuma yace an kara samar da wasu wurraren karban wadannan katin zaben 

Sai dai wasu jamaa a jihar sunce zasu ci gaba da yiwa jamaar su yekuwa domin su fito su karbi wannam katin, kuma sun bukaci hukumar kara samar da cibiyoyin karban wadannan katin zabe 

Shugaban Karamar hukumar Mariga Abdulmalik San Daji ya shaidawa Mustafa Nasir Ba ri cewa duk da yake suna fadakar da mutane muhimmacin karban katin zaben amma wuraren karban su yayi kari 
Jami’an Kungiyar ron sa kai ta farin kaya da ake kira sun ce sun gano wai sabon samarwa kungiyar Boko Haram da man fetur ta kan hanyar Maiduguri zuwa Mafa 

Kwamandan mayakan kungiyar ta sa-kai, Alhaji Abdullahi Ibrahim ne ya bayyana haka a wata hira da manema labarai 

Kwamandan ya bayyana cewa, mutanen suna zuba man ne cikin motoci wadansu lokatai su cika jarkuna su dinke a cikin buhuna kafin su dauka su tafi bayan gari 

Rundunar ta kama mutane da jarkunan mai arba’in da uku banda wadansu goma sha bakwai da aka samu a cikin mota Bisa ga cewar Kwamandan, wadansu lokaci mutanen sukan kera wai tanki na musamman a motocinsu suna zuwa gidajen mai na NNPC su sayi mai domin su fitar waje 

Alhaji Abdullahi Ibrahim yace mutanen sukan dauki man zuwa garin Ngwam a hanyar Mafa inda suke saukewa sai ‘yan kungiyar Boko Haram su fito daga jeji su bada kudi su kwashe 

Ga cikakken rahoton da wakilinmu Haruna Dauda Bi'u ya aiko daga Maiduguri, Najeriya
Kwararru sun bayyana cewa idan aka sake lale, kafofin yada labarai na cikin gida a Najeriya suna iya buga kirji a gaban takwarorinsu na kasashen ketare da a halin yanzu suka fi su kwarjini 

Masu kula da lamura sun bayyana cewa, tuni kafofin sadarwa suka fara yunkurowa wajen samar da labarai masu sahihi a kan lokaci, tare kuma da kyakkyawan amfani da na’urorin zamani 

Sai dai kuma sun ce ba za a iya cimma wannan burin ba sai gwamnatoci sun zage damtse wajen samar da yanayin da ya dace da kuma kayan aiki da zai ba jama’a zabi 

A jawabi wajen wani taron bunkasa aikin jarida da akayi a Gombe, Professa Pate shugaban ngayan koyon aikin jarida na jami’ar Bayero dake Kano ya bayyana cewa, akwai kalubala dake gaban ‘yan jarida da kuma gwamnatoci na cimma muradan aikin Yace zamanin yin abinda dan jarida yaga dama ya wuce, yace idan basu sake lale ba, zasu rasa masu sauraro, kuma masu tallace tallace suma su guje su abinda zai iya durkusar da kafofin sadarwa da suke yiwa aiki 

A bangaren gwamnati kuma, Pate yace illar rashin inganta kafofin sadarwar , mutane zasu rika sauraron radiyo mai jini dake yayata labaran karya wanda zai iya jefa al’umma cikin rudani

 ta kammala wa'adinta a watan da ya gabata, wanda chanjin mulkin dimokradiyya na farko a tun shekara Uwargida , wacce kuma ta sami ar yabo ta Nobel, itace mace ta farko da ta taba zama shugabar kasa a, tayi wa'adi biyu, kowanne na won shekaru , amman kundin rin mulkin kasar bai bata damar ta sake yawa takara ba

Masu zanga-zangar dai sunce shguaba tta na neman ya sakawa ‘yan jam’iyyarsa mai mulki

Kasar ta Kudu ta ayyana karshen annobar cutar kwalara a cikin kasar a hukume, da ta barke a cikin kasar sama da watanni da suka wuce, ta kama mutane sama da dubu kana kuma ta kashe wasu 

 
Ma’aikatar kiwon lafiyar ta Kudu ta ayyana karshen annobar kwalara a cikin kasar bayan da ba’a samu labarin wani ya kamu da cutar ba, har won makoni bakwai Kungiyoyin bada taimako sun ce matakai da dama ne suka kawo karshen yaduwar wannan muguwar cuta a kasar da yaki ya daidaita 

Sun ce matakan sa ido mai ingi ne wuraren da da aka samu bular anobar cutar, yayin aka tura rukunin ma’aikatan jinya na sha yanzu domin gudanar da bincike a wuraren su kuma duba wadanda suka harbu Sun ce kokarin samar da ruwamai kyau, da wayarwa jama’a kai akan muhimmin fta da kuma jinyar wadanda suka kamu da kwalara, sune matakan da suka taka rawar gani wurin kawo karshen cutar 

Jerin gudanar da ayyukan bada alluran rigakafi a bara ya bada gudunmuwa ga kawo karshen cutar Hukumar bada allurer rigakafi ta kasa ta kasa ta, ta digawa mutane sama da miliyon biyu da dubu dari biyu maganin rigakafin cutar 

Mai Magana da yawun hukumar, ya fadawa Muryar Amurka cewa, rigakafin da ke bada kariyar sheakru biyar, an baiwa mutane sama da miliyon daya, amma kuma yace shirin allurar rigakafin ya huski ma lar kayan aiki

Hakan ce tasa a kowace ranar ga watan Fabrairun kowace shekara ilahirin daliban Jami'ar Abdulmumuni da sauran daliban makarantun birnin Yamai su kan yi gangamin tunawa da 'yan uwan nasu da suka kwanta dama

A saurari rahoton Mani domin karin bayani

Lauya Miguna Miguna da hukumomin kasar suka kora bisa zargin cin amanar kasa domin halartar bukin ran r da madugun adawa yace gwamnatin bata da hujja, ya kuma jadada cewa, madugun adawan ne halaltaccen shugaban kasa 

, 
Wani lauyan kasar da aka tasa keyarshi zuwa farkon makon nan bisa zargin cin amanar kasa, ya kalubali korarshi daga kasar a kotu, yana neman a bashi izinin komawa kasar ta Afrika yayinda yake jadada cewa, madugun adawa ne halaltaccen shugaban kasar ba Shugaba Uhuru tta ba 

An tasa keyar Miguna Miguna, wanda yake da izinin zama dan kasashen biyu da kuma, zuwa birnin ranar Talata bayanda ya halarci kwarya kwaryar bukin ran r da a birnin ranar ta ga watan Janairu Miguna kuma yana daya daga cikin lauyoyin
 

An kama Miguna ne ranar Jumma'a da ta gabata a gari Runda, kana ranar Talata hukumomin kasar suka tilasa shi shiga jirgin da ya tashi da daga zuwa ta Tasa keyarshi zuwa da aka yi ya saba umarnin da babbar kotun kasar ta bayar cewa, a gabatar da shi gaban a ranar Laraba, bayan kwanaki biyar da kama shi 

Ministan harkokin cikin gida ya buga a shafin cewa, Miguna ya sadakar da zama dan kasar shekaru da dama da suka shige, ya zama dan kasar bayanda aka bashi mafaka a kasar lokacinda yake karatun aikin lauya a jami'ar 

Miguna haifaffen kasar ya mu cewa ya sallama kasarsa ta asali, ya kuma bukaci a nuna takardar da ta nuna haka idan gwamnati tana da hujja

 Wata mota yi mugun lodi tana ra wa ta wani sanin 'Yan gudun hijira na Assaga dake yankin Diffa na Nijar 
Rarraba 

Wata kungiyar farar hula mai zaman kanta da ake kira ce ta shirya neman gudumawar 

Mazauna kauyen N'Galewa a yankin Diffa a jamhuriyar Nijar, suna cikin mawuyacin hali, saboda ala tilas suka bar muhallansu cikin watan Yulin bara, bayan da mayakan da ake zargi 'yan Boko Haram ne suka sace musu 'yan uwansu maza da mata da yara su , kuma har yanzu babu labarin su 

Wannan ya sa suka bar muhallansu, suka fada mawuyacin hali Domin haka ne ma wata kungiyar Fara hula da ake kira, karkashin jagorin Hajiya Maimuna, ta shirya neman gudumawa daga jama'a da kungiyoyi, domin tallafawa mutanen 

A hirar da suka yi da wakilin Sashen Hausa Sule Mummuni Barma, Hajiya Mainmuna ta shaida masa, a shekarun baya ma, kungiyar ta shirya irin wannan neman tallafai ga wadansu da suka tagayyara, har mutane dubu suka amfana karkashin shirin 

Ga hirar ta su 

Miliyoyin mutane na fuskantar barazanar yunwa a kasar Kamaru da yankunan dake makwabta sakamakon kwararowar hamada da kuma hare haren kungiyar Boko Haram

, 
Gwamnatin kasar Kamaru tace yankin kan iyakarta da Najeriya, da Chadi, da kuma galibin yankin tafkin Chadi yana fuskantar ma lar karin abinci sabili da kwararowar hamada, da kuma tashin hankalin kungiyar Boko Haram da ya hana manoma gudanar da ayyukansu 

Hukumomi sunce kwararowar hamada ya shafi kashi arba'in cikin dari na kan iyakar kasar da Najeriya da kuma Chadi, kuma zai iya haifar da yunwa da zata shafi kashi ta cikin dari na mutane miliyan uku dake zaune a yankin na arewacin kasar, da ya hada da 'yan gudun hijira daga Najeriya dubu tamanin da kuma 'yan gudun hijira na cikin gida dubu dari 

Kasar dake kiyar Afrika tace lamarin zai iya kara muni sabili da tashin hankalin kungiyar Boko Haram ya hana manoma aiki a gonakinsu, abinda ya sa abincin da ake nomawa ya ragu ainun 

Lamarin ya kuma yi muni a kasashen dake yankin Chadi wadanda ke dogara ga kasar Kamaru domin samun abinci yayinda ake fama da hare haren mayakan 

A wani gagarumin mataki na fatattakar 'yan ta'adda, sojoji da 'yan sandan kasar Masar sun ce sun yi rugu-rugu da makaman 'yan ta'adda da sauran kayan aika-aikarsu baya ga kashe wasu daga cikinsu da kuma damke da su ka yi 

 
Yau dinnan Lahadi, Rundunar Sojin Masar ta ce ta hallaka wasu ‘yan bindiga sannan ta kama wasu da ake zargi su wajen sama a wani aikin kakkabe ta’addi wanda ta kaddamar a makon jiya, inda ta auna ‘yan ta’adda da sauran miyagu da kungiyoyinsu a fadin kas

Kafar labarai ta Rters ta ce mai magana da yawun Rundunar Sojin, Kanar Tamer el-Rufai, ya fadi yau Lahadi cewa an auna motoci da makamai da na’urorin sadarwa da ma gonakin tabar sa maye ta a wannan aikin 

A wani jawabinta da aka yada ranar Jumma’a ta gidan talabijin, Rundunar sojin ta ce da sojoji da ‘yan sanda duk sun taka rawa a abin da ta kira rarren samame 

Wannan aikin ron ya mai da hankali ne kan yankin  mai fama da tashin hankali, inda a bara ‘yan bindiga su ka kai hari kan wani masallacin Sufaye, su ka kashe masu ibada wajen 

Har yanzu dai ana ci gaba da shawarwari kanin shugaba da mataimaki wanda shugaban jam'iyyar yanzu 

Shugaban Afirka ta kudu yana ci gaba da samun matsin a daga cikin-da-wajen jam'iyyar mai mulkin kasar, cewa yayi murabus Shugaban yana ka mai wuya dangane da zarge-zargen cin hi da rashawa da suka yi masa katutu 

Mataimakin shugaban kasa, kuma sabon shugaban jam'iyyar ta , ya gayawa taron jama'a a bikin cika shekaru da sakin   mandela daga kurkuku a Lahadin nan cewa, su kara hakuri ana ci gaba da tattaunawa dangane da makomar shugaban na Afirka ta kudu 

Mai sharhi kan al'amuran yau da kullum, Abdullahi Yusuf, na jami'ar dake Afrika ta kudu, yace cikin batutuwa da ake jin sune suke hana sauka, sun hada harda neman kariya daga hukunci idan ya sauka 

yace, kwan-gaba-kwan-baya da ake yi kan batun saukar sa ya shafi harkokin yau da kullum 

Ga karin bayani 

Iyaye mata masu kula da marayu a Jamhuriyar Nijar, suna korafin kan karin taimako da sukan samu domin kula da yaran da mazajensu suka mutu suka bar masu 

 
Ma lar kula da maruya a kasashe masu tasowa musamman ma a Afirka, wani babban kalubale ne da iyaye, musamman mata ke fuskanta 

A lokuta da dama, idan mahaifi ya rasu, ya bar ‘ya’ya, uwar kan shiga mawuyacin hali wajen kula da wadannan yara ta fuskoki daban-daban 

A Jihar Agadez da ke Jamhuriyar Nijar, akwai mata da dama da suka tsinci kansu a cikin irin wannan kangi na kula da marayu 

Dangin uba, babu wanda ya taba lekowa, ya ce ga shi ko da kwayar hatsi daya, ki taimaka wa yaran nan Inji wata da majinta ya rasu ya bar mata ‘ya’ya, wacce kuma ta nemi a sakaya sunanta 

Yau idan aka ce mijinka ya fadi ya mutu, sai dai ka kai kukanka ga Allah Wata mata ta biyu ta fadawa wakiliyarmu Tamar Abari 

Labarin wadannan mata, kadan ne daga cikin dumbin iyaye da ke fuskantar irin wannan ma la 

Sai dai akan samun daidaikun kungiyoyi da kan tallafawa irin wadannan mata wajen kula da marayun 

Maraya yana bukatar taimako, musamman ma a nan jihar Agadez, ba taimako na ka bashi kudi ba, ka taimaka ka sa shi a hanya ta kwarai Inji Mamman Albishir, wakili a kungiyar HAI, da ke taikamawa marayu a jihar ta Agadez 

Saurari cikakken rahoton Tamar Abari domin jin karin bayani

A Jamhuriyar Nijar, kafafen yada labarai masu zaman kansu sun shiga yajin aiki na wuni guda a yau Litinin 

Yajin aikin wani mataki ne da kafafen yada labaran suka dauka da nufin nuna rashin jin dadinsu akan wani shirin bincike da gwamnatin kasar ke shirin kaddamarwa 

A ranar Larabar, hukumomin kasar shirin fara tante wadanda suka biya haraji daga shekarar ya zuwa yanzu

A ka’ida wannan ba ma la ba ce, wanda ya saba biya a kowace shekara akwai takardu akwai komai, sannan bayan haka sai a zo a ce maka za a zo a duba shekara hudu ko biyar, za a zo a sake dubawa a ga ko ka biya ko baka biya ba, muna mmanin akwai zan ce a kasa Inji Abdurrahman Mustapha Zangoma, mamba a kungiyar kafafen yada labaran

Ga Sule Mumuni Barma da Karin bayani 

Shugabar Majalisar Dokokin Afirka ta Kudu ta ce an dage jawabin shugaban kasa na shekara shekara da ya kamata ya yi jibi lamarin dake kara nanta matsin ar da ake yiwa shugaban ya sauka daga mulki yayinda kasar ta samu sabon shugaban jam'iyyar mai mulki

 
Za’a dage shirin da akan yi a gabatarda babban jawabin shekara-shekara na halin da kasa ke ciki da ya kamata shugaban Afrika ta Kudu ya gabatar jibi Alhamis, abinda ke kara nanta matsin ar da ake yiwa shugaban na ya sauka daga karagarsa ta mulki 

Shugabar majalisar dokoki Baleka Mbete ce ta bada sanarwar jingine gabatarda jawabin yayinda take hira da manema labarai yau a birnin , inda ta bada hujjar cewa ana neman samarda yanayin masalaha na siyasa a cikin majalisar kafin a yi jawabin

Gwamnatin ta Kudu ta janye jakadanta na Amurka, bayan da shugaban Amurka din, ya saka wani takunkumin hana sayar da makamai akan gwamnatin kasar a makon da ya gabata 

Mataimakin shugaban ta Kudu na farko, Gai, ya ce, matakin da Amurkan ta dauka zai kawo cikas wajen yunkurin da ake yi na samar da zaman lafiya a kasar 

Gai ya kara da cewa, takunkumin ya zo musu da mamaki, ganin cewa yana zuwa ne a daidai lokacin da wata tawagar gwamnati ke shirin barin Birnin domin halartar wani babban taro a karo na biyu, wanda zai dubi yadda za a farfado da yarjejeniyar sulhun da aka cimma a shekarar 

Bangarorin da ke fada a kasar ta ta Kudu, sun rattaba hanu akan yarjejeniyar dakatar da fadan a karshen taron da suka gudanar a karon farko a watan Disamba 

Sai dai wannan yarjejeniya ta samu cikas, cikin ‘yan kwanakin da suka biyo baya, inda dukkan bangarorin biyu suka saba yarjejeniyar

Sai dai duk da dakarun wanzar da zaman lafiya na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya da aka girke, da kuma dakarun dake aiki karkashin wani shirin kakkabe mayaka na Fara , ana ci gaba da samun karuwa tashin hankali da hare hare a kudin kasar kusa da Bamako babban birnin kasar 
Hare-hare da aka kai a lokaci guda a kasar Kamaru, da ake zargin yan awaren Kamaru da kaiwa, a wasu yankuna biyu na masu amfani da turi wanda yayi sanadiyar mutuwar mutane da dama ciki har da sojoji da yan awaren 

Gwamnatin Kamaru tace an kashe mata sojoji da yan awaren da dama An kona kauyuka da masu yawa haka kuma dubban mutane sun arce yayin da mayakan awaren suka kai hari a kan sa nonin sojoji, su kuma sojojin gwamnatin sun mayar da martani a kan kauyukan da ake zaton suna baiwa yan awaren mafaka Wakilin Muryar Amurka Moki E in Kindzeka ya ziyarci garin Kumbo, inda aka bada rahoton aukuwar hargitsi na baya bayan nan 

Wasu mutanen kauye su ta yawin su yara ne, sun nemi mafaka a wani ginin majami’ar Katolika a kauyen Tadu dake kusa da garin Kumbo a yankin arewa maso yammacin kasar na masu amfani da turi 

Hukumar kula da yan gudun hijira ta Majalisar Dinkin Duniya tace ya zuwa watan Janairu, dubban yan Kamaru dake yankin turanin kasar sun ketara zuwa cikin Najeriya kuma an ce taimakon da suke bukata na kara yawa 
Yan tawayen kungiyar adawa a ta, masu biyayya ga Riek Machar sun ce sun mika sojojin gwamnati ga kungiyar agaji ta kasa da kasa ta, a karamin filin saukar jiragen sama na KoloPach, a jihar Jonglei 

Mukaddashin mai Magana da yawun kungiyar yan tawayen ta ya fada a jiya Lahadi cewa, goma sha daya a cikin sojojin gwamnatin sun ki yarda su je birnin Juba, gudun kwamandodjinsu zasu musguna musu 

Kungiyar yan tawayen sun yi marhabi da shawarar sojojin kuma suka basu yin zama tare da mutanen da suka rasa matsuganansu a cikin jihar 

Wannan dai karo na uku da kungiyar yan tawayen ta nuna biyayya ga yarjejeniyar gaita wuta da aka sanyawa hannu a cikin wata Disemban bara, yayin da wasu bangarori na wannan yarjejeniyar, har yanzu basu fara mutunta ka’idodin ta, inji 

Kungiyar kasa da kasa ta bata tabbatar ko karyata wannan batu na mika sojojin ba, sai dai tace ba zata yi wani bayani a kan tattaunawa da tayi da bangarorin ko kuma nasara da ake samu 

A kokarin ganin tattalin arzikin kasarsa ya bunkasa, shugaban Liberiya ya rage ma ka albashi da wasu alawus-alawus

 
Shugaban kasar Liberiya, ya bayyana cewa ya rage yawan albashin sa dama wasu alawus-alawus di , tare da fatan ‘yan majalisar dokokin kasar su ma zasu bi sahu 

A bisa ri dai shugaban kasar Liberiya zai samu albashin da zai kai dala miliyan ne a shekara 

Shugaban ya bayyana hakan a lokacinda yayi wa kasa jawabin farko a ranar littinin 

Shugaba yace ya gaji tattalin arzikin kasa dake da rauni saboda faduwar darajar kudin kasar, da ma lar hauhawar farashin kayayyaki da abin masarufi, da rashin aikin yi tare da karin kudi a lalitar gwamnati dake kasar waje 

Wani batu da shugaban yace zai ba wa muhimmaci yadda ‘yan kasar suka dade suna neman 'yin zama ‘yan kasa biyu 

Shugaba yace ana yi wa kowanne dan kasa maraba da dawowa gida koda kuwa yana da iznin zama dan wata kasa ce dabam da kasar Liberiya, muddin dai shi dan asalin kasar ne 

Haka kuma yace gwamnati zata baiwa abubuwa hudu muhimmi, wadanda suka hada da bunkasa tattalin arzikin kasa tare da samar da aikin yi da kuma ganin zaman lafiyar dake kasar yaci gaba da dorewa sai kuma tafiyar da ayyukan gwamnati ba tare da boye-boye ba 

Kungiyar boko haram takai hari a garin Shatemeri dake cikin jamhuriyar har ta kashe dan karamin yaro guda 

 
‘Yan boko haram sun kai hari a garin Shetimari dake jihar Difa a Jamhuriyar Nijar Wannan harin yayi sanadiyyar hasarar rai 

Wakiliyar sashen Hausa Tamar Abari ta ce a zantawar ta da wani dan taliki da ya nemi a boye suna , ya bayyana mata cewa maharan sun kawo hari ne bayan sallar magariba 

Yace ba zato ba mmani da magariba sai suka ga motoci da yawan su ya kai sun bi ta inda sojoji suke kuma kawo lokacin da yake bayani bai san halin da suke ciki ba 

Yace a cikin garin ba wani wanda ya jikkata, sai dai da aka tambaye shi batun hasarar rai sai yace harsashi ya gilma kuma ya sami wani dan karamin yaro 

Yaci gaba da cewa maharan basu shigo cikin gari ba, daga wajen gari ne sukayi dukkan abinda suka yi, kuma jami'an gwamnati ba su kawo ziyara a inda wannan lamari ya faru ba 

Kwamitin sulhun Majalisar Dinkin Duniya a jiya Talata ya sabunta takunkumin makamai a kan jamhuriyar Afrika ta kiya da shekarar guda, kuma yayi karin wani ma’aunin da zai kai ga karin sabbin takunkumai 

 
Kudurin da Fara ta gabatar, ya samu amincewar bakin dayan wakilan kwamitin 

Baicin karin lokacin takunkumin, kudurin ya kuma yi Allah wadai da amfani da addini da kabili wurin iza tashin hankali Yace duk wanda ya aikata irin wannan laifin zai fuski jan kunne 

Rura wutar tashin hankali wata babbar annoba ce ga Jamhuriyar Afrika ta kiya kuma ya haddasa tashin hankalin da yayi sanadiyar jikatta fararen hula da dama da ma wasu dakarun wanzar da zaman lafiya na, inji wakilin Fara a kwamitin sulhun Yace kasar Afrika ta kiya ba zata zauna lafiya ba, muddin za a ci gaba da rura wutar tashin hankali kuma kwamitin sulhun zai dauki alhakin kulawa da hakan 

Kasar Afrika ta kiya ta fada cikin tashin hankali, tun bayan da yan tawayen Musulmi suka hambarar da shugaban kasar Krista 

Mabiya addinin Krista kuma sun maida martani, wanda yayi sanadiyar mutuwar dubban mutane daga dukkan bangarorin kana dubban yan gudun hij Musulmi suka suka arce zuwa Kamaru da Chadi 


Karin harajin da gwamnatin Nijar ta yi a farkon shekarar nan ya soma yin tasiri a saboda kamfanin wutar lanta ya kara kudi, abun da ya shafi harakar aikin yin nika da injina a kasar, har gidajen nika sun shiga yajin aiki na kwana daya domin jawo hankalin mahukunta akan halin da suke ciki

 
A cikin garin Maradi masu injinan nika sun yar da aiki na yini guda da zummar bayyana ma lar da suke fuskanta sabili da karin kudi da kamfanin wutar lanta ya yi 

To sai dai karin na da nasaba da sabuwar dokar biyan haraji da gwamnatin kasar ta kafa ta kuma fara aiki farkon shekarar nan 

Malam Isaka Boi sakataren kungiyar masu nika a Maradi ya ce tun karfe shida na safe yake zagayawa ya ga gidan nika da yake aiki amma babu ko daya A cewarsa dole ne suka shiga yajin domin babu abun da zasu iya yi 

Muryar Amurka ta garzaya zuwa kamfanin wutar lanta ta ji ta bakinsu Alhaji Mamman Abdulrahaman shugaban kamfanin ya ce abun ya fi karfin kamfanin saboda dokar kasa ce ta kara haraji 

A bangaren talakawa, masu kosai, masu sarafa fura zuwa masu gidaje dake kai nikan abun da zasu ci sun ce yanzu ba kosai kuma babu tuwo Wani ya ce tunda safe ake yawo a samu inda za'a nika masa masara amma babu 

Ga rahoton Chuaibu Mani da karin bayani
Ministan harkokin cikin gida na yayi gargadin cewa za a iya kama shugaban adawa dangane da bikin ran r da shi a ma yin shugaban mutane ranar Talata A halin da ake ciki hukumomi sun ce an hana gidajen yada labaran cikin gida yada bikin na ranar Talata har sai an kammala bincike 

Ministan cikin gida Matiang’i ya ce bikin nadin , wani yunkuri ne na hambarar da gwamnati 

Biyo bayan wani taron manema labarai da ministan yayi jiya Laraba, gidajen yada labaran kasar har sun rawaito cewa an kama a kalla mutum guda, lawya kuma ‘dan majalisar adawa wanda ya ya tare da lokacin da ake ran r da shi 

Wani masanin shari’a ya fadawa Muryar Amurka cewa abu ne mai wahala ga hukumomi su kama , saboda a bikin ba a ran r da shi ba a ma yin shugaban kasar ba Yanzu haka a shafi na ana bayyana shi da sunan mai g  
Shugabannin nahiyar Afirka na dab da bukatar shugaban Amurka ya fito bainar jama’a ya nemi afuwa kan kalaman bati da akace yayi kan nahiyar Afirka da bakin haure, amma sai suka canza shawara a cewar wani rahoto 

Kungiyar tarayyar Afirka ta ta rubuta martaninta ga shugaban a taron kolin da ta gudanar cikin wannan makon 

Martanin da aka rubuta na gargadin cewa kalamun na bati da nuna kalibi, ya saka dangantakar Amurka da kasashen Afirka cikin hadari 

Ta ce shugabannin Afirka sunyi mamaki ga kalamun da ake ce yayi, abin bakin ciki ne da mamaki kan kaskantar da mutanen da suka fito daga Afirka da ma wadanda ba farar fata ba da gwamnatin ke yi 

Amma sai kungiyar ta yanke shawarar kin fitar da wasikar Tana mai nuni ga wasikar da ya rubuta ranar ga watan Janairu, wadda cikinta ne yace yana matukar ganin mutuncin Afirka, ya kuma bayyana cewa sakataren harkokin wajen Amurka zai kara kai ziyara Afirka a watan Maris 

Haka kuma ya gana da shguaban kasar a gefen taron kolin tattalin arzikin kasashen duniya a makon da ya gabata

A karshen taron jakadun dake kasashen yankin tafkin Chadi da aka gudanar a birnin Yamai a kasar Nijar aka fayyace rin ayyukan da za'a gudanar a bana, shekarar 

Shirin zai shafi sama da mutane da rikicin Boko Haram ya daidaita Cikinsu akwai 'yan gudun hij Najeriya sama da dubu Ma lr ta shafi masu masaukin baki su sama da dubu a kasashen Nijar, Chadi da Kamaru 

Mataimakiyar kwamishanar ta ce zasu yi anfani da kudaden a fannonin da suka hada da ci gaban ayyukan rajistan 'yan gudun hijira a Diffa, yankin da ya fi koina samun bakuncin 'yan gudun hij Najeriya 

Za'a yi anfani da kudin wurin samar da abinci ga al'umma bisa ga yin la'akari da cewa a watan Satumbar an gano mutane miliyan bakwai da rabi ne suke cikin karin abinci a Nijar Kana za'a mayar da hankali akan sha'anin ilimi saboda bincike ya nuna cewa kashi cikin na 'ya'yan mutanen da suka yi hijira a yankin basa zuwa makaranta 

Kazalika za'a dauki matakan samar da cimaka mai jiki ga yara kanana da kuma inganta kiwon lafiya 

Hukumar na kokarin shawo ma lar rajistan yaran da aka haifesu a sa nonin 'yan gudun hijira ta hanyar wayar da kawunan jama'a musamman a kasar Kamaru inda makiyaya ke ketarawa zuwa Najeriya domin neman ciyawar dabbobi, inji wakilin 'yan gudun hijira a kasar ta Kamaru 

Jakadan a kasar Chadi ya bayyana cewa ci gaban tabarbarewar ro a kewayen tafkin Chadi na kawo cikas ga jami'an agaji wajen isar da doki ga 'yan gudun hijira a kasar ta Chadi 

Baya ga 'yan gudun hij Najeriya, Nijar na samun bakuncin 'yan gudun hij kasar wadanda tuni wasu cikinsu suka fara gudanar da sana'o'i, lamarin da ya sa ana ganin wasunsu ba zasu koma inda suka fito ba duk da ikirarin da UN tayi na cewa mayar da su magana ce ta dan lokaci 

Ga rahoton Souley Barma da karin bayani

kakakin gwamnatin Jamhuriyar Dimukradiyyar Kwango, ya ce, shugaba , na da niyyar ya mutunta kundin rin mulkin kasar tare da shirin mika mulki bayan an kammala zabe

 
Wani kakakin gwamnatin Jamhuriyar Dimukradiyyar Kwango, ya ce, shugaba, na da niyyar ya mutunta kundin rin mulkin kasar tare da shirin mika mulki bayan an kammala zabe, kamar yadda aka ra za a yi a watan Disamba 

Yayin wata ganawa da ya yi da sashen Faransi na Muryar Amurka, ya ce duk da jinkirin da ake samu, gwamnati na kokarin kammala shirya rijistar masu kada kuri’a a yankunan karkara, kuma za a yi zaben kamar yadda hukumar zaben ta ra 

Kakakin ya kara da cewa, shugaba ba shi da niyyar sake ya wa takara, sannan a watan Yuli zai bayyana zabi na dan takarar da zai nemi maye gurbi a zaben na watan Disamba 

Kamar dai yadda kundin rin mulkin kasar ta ya tanada, ba a amince shugaban kasa ya ya takara a wa’adi na uku a jere ba 

A watan Janairun , shugaba ya karbi mulkin kasar, bayan da aka kashe mahaifi

An zabi Uhuru tta a ma yin shugaban ne a ranar ga watan Oktoban shekarar , a cikin wani zabe da kotun kolin tayi na’am da shi, inji mai Magana da yawun ma’aikatar harkokin wajen Amurka Nauert a jiya Alhamis

Duik da ikirarin da gwamnatin jamhuriyar Nijar keyi na cewa ta kakkabe boko Haram har yanzu da sauran rina a kaba
 
Ikirarin samun nasarar yaki da boko haram da mahukuntar jamhuriyar keyi ba sabon labari bane a cikin kasar 

Wannan ikirarin daga matakin koli har na zuwa yankin Diffa wanda yafi fuskantar hukubar wannan yaki wanda ya tilasta jamaa barin matsugunnin su, zuwa wasu wurare har yanzu akwai sauran sa

Ga Sule Mummuni Barma da Karin bayani
Mata Musulmi sun bayyana matukar kokawarsu kan yadda ake cin zarafinsu a gaban dakin Allah a lokutan aikin Hajji 

Suna yin amfani da maudu'in da ke aikewa da sakonni kan yadda ake cin zarafin mata a wuraren ibada 

Fitacciyar 'yar jaridar nan 'yar kasar Masar da ke Amurka Mona Eltahawy, ta bayyana yadda wasu suka rika neman yin lalata da ita a lokacin aikin Hajjin shekarar 

Musulmi maza da mata sun soma yin amfani da maudu'in a fadin duniya a ranar Lahadi kuma cikin kasa da sa'o'i an aike da sakon , a kan batun 

 llake wallafa daga

Karshen wallafa daga

Ya kase daya daga cikin manyan batutuwan da masu amfani da a suka fi yin tsokaci a ka 

Akasarin matan da suka yi tsokaci a kai sun bayyana cewa an rika taba jiki ko rungumarsu a cikin Harami 

An yi ittifaki cewa sama da mutum miliyan biyu ne ke yin aikin Hajji a duk shekara, inda ake yin taruwar da babu wani addini da ke hada dandazon mutane irin wannan 

Babu karin bayanai

 Faburairu, 


A Najeriya ma wasu mata da dama sun shaidawa cewa irin haka ta faru da su a lokutan aikin hajji ko Umra, amma ba su bayyana hakan a shafukan sada zumunta kamar yadda 'yan wasu kasashen suka yi ba 

Matan sun ce amma saboda ri na al'adar Bahaushe sai suka yi gum da bakinsu ba su shaida wa kowa ba Sai dai wasu sun ce tun a haramin suka gayawa 'yan sanda da ke gadin wajen wato Askar 

"Ni kam a take na nuna wa wani Askar mutumin kuma sun dauki mataki a ka ," in ji wata da ta bukaci a boye sunanta Musulunci dai ya u i mata su rika rufe jikinsu daga kai zuwa kafa domin su kare martabarsu sannan kada maza su kalle su 

Wasu matan kuma sun ce baya ga cin zarafi yayin ibada ma an yi ta kokarin neman yin lalata da su a motoci ko yayin da suka je sayayya shaguna a lokacin aikin hajji 

Mata da dama a kasashe irinsu Masar, da kuma sun ce har yanzu suna fuskantar cin zarafi a kan hanya, duk da sanya kaya masu rufe jiki da suke yi 

Masu amfani da maudu'in sun ce ana cin zarafinsu ko da a wuraren ibada masu sauki ne, kuma ko da jikinsu a rufe yake kuma suna Sallah 

Masu amfani da a sun bayyana yadda aka ci zarafinsu a wuraren aikin Hajji, kuma sun kalubali masu cewa sanya hijabi yana hanawa a ci zarafin mata 
na Afirka Ta Kudu yana cikin ma nin yanayi inda ya zama babban birni na farko a wannan zamanin da yake fuskantar barazanar rashin ruwan sha 

Haka kuma, ma lar farin da ke addabar birnin na daya daga cikin manyan alamun da masana suka dade suna gargadi na cewa za a fuski rashin ruwan sha 

Duk da cewa ruwa ne ya mamaye kashi cikin na g n duniya, musamman ma ruwan sha, to bai fa kai yawan da mutane ke tunani ba 

Kashi uku cikin na ruwan da ke kwe a duniya ne kawai ftatacce da za a iya sha 

Fiye da mutum biliyan daya ke fama da rashin ruwan sha, kuma mutum biliyan ke cikin halin ka mai wuya na neman ruwan da za su yi amfanin yau da kullum da shi na akalla wata guda a cilkin shekara 

Wani bincike da aka gudanar a shekarar kan manyan be a duniya, ya yi kiyasin cewa mutum daya cikin hudu na cikin nanin bukatar ftataccen ruwa 

Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta fara ayyana wasu ayyukan samar da ruwa, Majalisar ta ce bukatar ruwa kanin al'umma za ta karu da kashi cikin a shekarar , wanda yawaitar al'umma, da sauyin yanayi da yanayin rayuwar da 'yanke yi za su assasa a wannan lokacin 

 
Bai kamata hakan ya zo da mamaki ba, idan aka kalli birnin na Afirka ta Kudu za a tabbatar da kalubalen da ake kan hanyar fuskanta 

Ga karin manyan be da su ma ke cikin barazanar rasa ruwan sha a duniya 

 Birnin

Babban birnin kasuwi na kasar Birazil, kuma daya daga cikin be masu yawan al'umma a duniya ya taba fuskantar halin da Afirka ta Kudu ta samu kanta a shekarar , a lokacin da tafkin da ake adana ruwa na kar ta kwana ya kusan kafewa da ruwan ya zama kashi hudu cikin 

A lokacin da aka fuski ma lar, birnin mai cike da al'umma sama da miliyan ya kusan yawa cak, cikin kwanaki an fuski ma lar da ta hada da satar ruwa da jami'an ro suka shiga lamarin ta hanyar sanya ido a wuraren da ruwan yake, domin kare shi daga barayi 

Hakkin mallakar hoto A lokacin da ma lar ta faru, sai da ma'ajiyar birnin ta zama karkaf babu ruwa 
A shekarar zuwa kudin kasar ya fuski fari ma fi muni 

Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta zargi gwamnatin kasar da gaza samar da wani shirin taimakawa al'umma samun sassaucin halin da suke ciki, amma shirin da majalisar ta yi a Sao Paulo ya sake sukar lamirin gwamnatin na rashin zuba jari a wani bangare da idan bukatar ruwan ta taso za a iya samar da shi cikin sauki 

A shekarar ne rashin ruwan ya zo karshe, amma kuma a shekarar sai ma'adinar ruwan ta sake yin baya ta koma kashi cikin adadin da ba a yi mmani ba a wannan lokacin kuma birnin ya sake komawa 'yar gidan jiya kan ma lar ruwan koma fiye da baya 

 Birnin

Hukumomin kudin birnin a kasar Indiya na cikin matsin a sakamakon sabbin gine-gine, sakamakon kara tumba da ya ke kara yi sakamakon zamowar birnin cibiyar Kimiyya da fasahar zamani 

Sai dai hukumomin na fadi tashin ganin an samu ingantaccen ruwa da mage ma lar magudanan ruwa 

Wani abu da ya kara janyo aka shiga mawuyacin hali shi ne sake toshewar magudanan ruwa da suke bukatar aikin gaggawa domn cire abubuwan da suka shiga manyan bututan da datti da dagwalon bandakunan mutanen yankin ke shiga ciki 

Daga bisani kuma gwamnati ta gano birnin ya rasa kusan kashi cikin na ftataccen ruwan sha 

Kamar kasar Sin, ita ma Indiya na fama da cukowar al'unmar dalilin da ke haddasa karin ruwa, kuma birnin ba shi da banbi mai yawa da in dai aka yi batun bukatun al'umma 

Sannan bincike ya gano bangaren noman rani da masana'antu na bukatar ruwa kashi domin tafiyar da su amma kuma babu isasshen na amfanin yau da kullum   kuma a wadata noman ranin 

Yayin da yawin kududdufai da kananan koguna ba su da ftataccen ruwan da mutane za su sha ba tare da sun kamu da wata cuta ba misali amai da gudawa 

Hakkin mallakar hoto Datti da kazantar da ta cika tafkin birnin ba za su bari a yi amfani da shi ba 
 Birnin

Bankin Duniya ya fassara abin da ake nufi da karin ruwa, da kwatanta hakan da idan mutane suka rasa ruwa kasa da mita na ftataccen ruwa ga ko wanne mutum guda a shekara 

A shekarar , cikin fiye da mutane miliyan ne suke cikin gararin rashin ruwa, yayin da duk mutum guda da ya kwana ya tashi a birnin yana samun ruwa mita ne kacal 

Kasar ita ce ta kwashe kusan kashi cikin na yawan al'ummar duniya, sai dai kash kashi cikin ne kadai ke samun ftataccen ruwan sha 

Wani bincike da jami'ar ta yi, ya yi kiyasin cewa ma'adanar ruwan ta kafe inda abin da ya yi saura bai fi kashi cikin ba daga shekarar zuwa 

Haka kuma cikowar da kasar ta yi da jama'a ya kara janyo ma lar 

Kididdigar da jami'an kasar suka fitar a shekarar ta nuna kashi cikin na ruwan birnin   ya baci da dattin da ake zubowa 

Hakan ya sanya ba ma za a iya amfani da shi ba a masana'antu da ban ruwa a gonaki lokacin noman rani 

Wani kokari da gwamnatin ta yi don shawo kan ma lar shi ne ta hanyar samar da wasu bututan da za su karkatar da ruwan zuwa wasu sassan kasar 

Sannan kuma sun samar da wani shiri na ilimantar da mutane da sanyawa 'yan kasuwa da ke amfani da ruwa karin haraji don su dauki lamarin da muhimmi 

 Birnin Alkhahira

Duk da kasewar kasar Masar ita ke iko da wani kaso mafi tsoka na kogin Nilu, a halin da ake ciki zamani ya sanya kasar shiga halin ni 'yasu 

Duk da kasewarta na diban kashi cikin na ruwan da Masar ta dogara da shi, a yanzu ya na cikin yanayi na kazanta saboda dattin da iyalan da ke kusa da gabarsa suke fitarwa, haka nan ruwan da ake amfani da shi don noman rani mai cike da sinadarai da taki sun kara bata shi 

Hakkin mallakar hoto Kashi na ruwan da Misirawa ke amfani da shi ya dogara ne da Bahar Nilu 
Hukumar lafiya ta duniya ta ce kasar Masar na daga cikin kasashe masu karamin karfi, da yawin al'ummarsu ke mutuwa sakamakon kamuwa da cutuka masu nasaba da ruwa mara fta 

Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ita ma ta ce kasar za ta shiga mawuyacin hali sakamakon rashin ruwa a shekarar 

 Birnin 

Kamar sauran kasashen duniya da ke gabar teku, shi ma babban birnin kasar Indonesiya na fuskantar barazanar tumba r teku 

Sai dai birnin na cikin ka mai wuya sakamakon ma lar tumba r teku 

Saboda kusan fiye da rabin al'ummar birnin miliyan ba sa samun ruwan famfo, yayin da haka rijiya ba bisa ka'ida ba ya zama babban laifi 

Wannan dalili ke haddasawa mazauna yankin ma lolin rashin ruwa da ma samun mai fta 

Bankin duniya ya ce babbar ma lar ita ce kusan kashi na mutanen birnin su na zaune ne a kusa da teku, da zarar ya tumba cikin kankanin lokaci zai shafe su 

Hakkin mallakar hoto Hakar rijiya ba bisa ka'ida ba na jefa birnin cikin hadarin ambaliyar ruwa 
 Birnin 

Kashi daya na ruwa mai fta da ake samarwar a duniya yana kasar Rasha, sai dai kasar na cikin ma lar gurbataccen hayaki da masana'antu ke fitarwa 

Wannan ce babbar ma lar da birnin ke ciki, kashi cikin na ruwan da al'umma suka dogara da shi su na samu ne idan aka yi ruwan sama 

Wata kididdiga da hukumomi suka bayyana, ta nuna kashi cikin na ruwan da ake sha ba shi da cikakkiyar fta 

 Birnin mbul

Kididdigar da gwamnatin Tuyya ta fitar, ta nuna kasar na cikin ka mai wuya na rashin ruwa tun bayan samun raguwar adadin ruwan da ake samu zuwa kubik , a shekarar 

Hukumomin al'umma a yankin karkara sun yi gargadin za a iya fuskantar rashin ruwa mafi muni a tarihin kasar a shekarar 

Hakkin mallakar Watanni kenan da fari ya afkawa wannan tafkin da ke birnin mbul 
Shekarun baya, yankuna masu cunkoson jama'a kamar birnin mbul, ya fara fuskantar raguwar ruwa a yankunan da a baya ba su cika samun ma lar ba 

A shekarar adadin ruwan da ake samu ya ragu da kashi cikin a farkon shekarar 

 Birnin 

A birnin kuwa, ba wani sabon abu ba ne a ce an samu raguwa a ruwan da al'ummar birnin kusan miliyan za su yi amfani da shi 

Cikin gidaje biyar, daya ne kadai suke iya samun ruwan famfo na wasu 'yan sa'o'i kalilan cikin mako guda, wasu kashi kuma na samun na kasa da sa'a daya a ko wacce rana 

Birnin na shigo da kashi cikin na ruwan da ake amfani da shi daga wuri mai nisa, sannan ba su da rin nan na sake ftace ruwa don yin amfani da shi misali a gonaki 

Yayin da kashi na ma lar ana fuskanta ne saboda lalacewar bututan ruwa 

 Birnin Landan

Cikin dukkan ben duniya, akan yi mamaki idan aka ce birnin Landan na cikin wadanda ke fuskantar karin ruwa 

Batun gaskiya shi ne, a shekara a kan samu zubar ruwan da bai kai na wasu kasashen ba 

Sai dai kuma birnin na Fara ma ya na fuskantar rashin yawan zubar ruwa a lokacin damuna, amma ya fi birnin 

Ana samar da ruwan da ake amfani da kashi cikin a birnin Landan daga Koguna 

Hakkin mallakar hoto Kashi cikin na ruwan birnin Landan ana al-mubazzari da shi 
 Birnin

Babban birnin kasar , na fuskantar shigen ma lar da wasu ben Amurka kan fuskanta, saboda samun yawaitar ruwan sama Ruwan na zuba ne cikin farkon watanni goma na shekara 

Ana nanin bukatar ruwa a kasar, saboda rashin zubar sa da yawa ko adanawa ka iya janyo fuskantar fari 

Akalla ana samun gine-gine masu zaman kansu kusan a birnin da suke samar da ruwan da ake amfani da shi a wuraren kasuwinsu 

Birnin mai al'umma sama da miliyan , ya dogara ne da kashi cikin na ruwan amfani daga Kogi, da kankarar da ake narkawa da kuma ruwan sama 

A baya-bayan nan masu zuba jari sun zuba a fannin bututan ruwa, da suka ra ta ayyukan more rayuwar jama'a 

 Birnin

Birnin na Amurka, na daga cikin ben kasar biyar da ke fuskantar mamakon ruwan sama a ko wacce shekara 

Amma kuma wasu daga cikin manyan ben da suka yi fice irin na fuskantar rashin ruwan 

A farkon karni na , an gudanar da wasu ayyuka don samar da ruwa a birnin, inda aka fara janyo ruwa daga Tekun Atilantika da kuma babbar mada r ruwa da ake amfani da ita wajen rarrabawa wato , da kuma baki dayan ruwan ya ke tare nan 

Hakkin mallakar hoto Yadda ruwan tekun Atilantika da birnin ke dogaro da shi da tacewa don amfani ya cika ya batse 
Duk da cewa a shekarar aka gano ma lar, amma har yanzu akwai wuraren da har yanzu suke yoyo, musamman saboda ben kasar na fuskantar tumba r teku akai-akai cikin kankanin lokaci 

Da yadda ruwan ke haurowa sama kamar zai shafe gidajen da ke bakin gaba Amma har yanzu akwai babbar barazanar kafewarsa nan ba da jimawa ba 

Labarai masu alaka 
A shekarar da ta gabata kungiyar Boko Haram ta yi amfani da 'yan kunar bakin wake yawi mata fiye da duk wata kungiyar ta'addi 

Kungiyar na tura matasan 'yan mata kusan a duk mako domin kai harin kunar bakin wake a kasuwanni da masallatai kai hatta ma da sa nonin 'yan gudun hijira 

Akwai kuma dubban irin wadannan mata matasa da suke rike da su a sa noninsu inda suke tilasta musu auren mayakansu 

A kwanan nan wasu da yawa daga cikin matan sun samu damar tserewa daga hannun 'yan Boko Haram din 
ta ta je Maiduguri babban birnin jihar Borno cibiyar kungiyar ta 'yan Boko Haram, inda ta gana da wasu daga cikin matan da suka tsira 

Wakiliyar ta gano cewa matan da suka tsirar na cikin wani yanayi na gaba kura baya sayaki duk da cewa sun tsere daga hannun 'yan Boko Haram to amma kuma a gida suna fuskantar kyama saboda kasewa a hannun masu tayar da kayar bayan 

Kamar yadda lamarin ya shafi wata mai suna Fatima, wadda matashiya ce mai shekara , kuma tana zaune da iyayenta a birnin Maiduguri ne 

Haduwarta da 'yan kungiyar Boko Haram sun fara ne bayan ta kammala makarantar iyya tana shirin samun miji domin ta yi aure ta ci gaba da rayuwarta 

Sai kwa m wannan kaddara ta fada mata a lokacin da ta kai ziyara garin kakanninta, lokacin da mayakan Boko Haram suka kai hari garin 

Wanna abin ya bude wani sabon babi a rayuwarta 
Daga nan ne mayakan suka yi awon gaba da Fatima, suka kai ta wani sa ninsu, inda suka tilasta mata auren wani daga cikin mayakan, haka ta ci gaba da rayuwa da shi 

Abinka da rayuwa da tayar da kayar baya, a kwana a tashi mijin nata ya gamu da ajali 

Daga na sai Fatima ta sha damarar bama-bamai na kunar bakin, ta kama hanyar zuwa birnin da ta g , kamar yadda aka tura ta, ta kai harin da zai halaka ta da sauran jama'a masu kan uwa da wabi Amma kuma a zuciyarta burinta a lokacin shi ne ta tsira daga hannun 'yan Boko Haram din

Da dama ga irin wadannan 'yan mata, tsira daga hannun 'yan Boko Haram ba shi ne karshen wannan rayuwa mai tayar da hankali ba, domin kamar sun gudu ne ba su tsira ba 

Wannan ne halin da suke samun kansu a ciki, daga bisani, domin, komawarsu cikin al'umma da iyalinsu, sai kuma su ga kusan ba a maraba da su, ana musu kallon kusan ba su da bambi da 'yan Boko Haram 

Abin ma ya fi nani ga wadanda aka tilasata wa zuwa kai harin kunar bakin wake 

Hakkin mallakar hoto 
Bayan duk wannann abu da ya faru da ita wanda yake kamar mafa, a yanzu Fatima na ganin ta taki sa'a a rayuwarta da ta fito daga waccan rayuwa a hannun 'yan Boko Haram 

A karshe dai Fatima ta kase daya daga cikin matasan 'yan mata wadanda suka yi sa'ar dawowa su ci gaba da rayuwarsu da sauran jama'a bayan kasewa tare da 'yan Boko Haram

Tuni wasu mutane suka bude shafin mai suna Macijin , wanda ke aikewa da sakonnin arashi kan batun

Shugaban ya yi k ne a lokacin da ake bikin bude sabon ofishin shiyya na hukumar a Kaduna da ke arewa maso yammacin Najeriya

S Jami'an za su yanke hukunci akan shugaba 
 

Kawo yanzu babu wani martani daga bangaren , kuma ba a san matakin da zai dauka ba 

Amma duk da haka wannan matakin ba zai yi wa shugaban dadi ba 

A daya bangaren kuma mutanen kasar ba za su gamsu da wannan matakin ba, domin jam'iyyar ta yi wa al'ummar kasar alkawarin kammala komai zuwa ranar Litinin 

Kara ma shugaba kwanaki biyu da jam'iyyar ta yi ya nuna irin ntsenin da jam'iyyar ta ke yi na kaucewa kazamin rikicin siyasa, musamman a majalisar kasar 

Mista na fuskantar tuhume-tuhume dangane da zargin cin hi da rashawa 

Sabon shugaban jam'iyyar, na kan gaba wajen neman a kawar da shugaba daga mukami , domin ya maye gurbi 

Mista babban attajiri ne, kuma tsohon dan kwadago ne, ya yi alkawarin mage ma lar cin hi da rashawa a bangaren gwamnati da kuma farfado da jam'iyyar kafin zabubbukan da za a yi a shekara mai zuwa 

Amma da alama jam'iyyar na dab da wa gida biyu, kuma shugaba ya kafe cewa kamata yayi a bar shi ya cigaba da mulkin kasar a makonni ko ma watanni masu zuwa 
 Jami'an za su yanke hukunci akan shugaba
Ana sa ran manyan jami'an jam'iyya mai mulki ta a Afirka ta Kudu za su nemi shugaba da ya sauka daga mukami a lokacin wani 

Wakilin a nahiyar Afirka , ya ruwaito cewa babban kwamitin jam'iyyar za nemi shugaban da ya yi murabus 

Shugaban jam'iyyar ta , ya ce wannan batun na "janyo rarrabuwar kawuna" 

Mista mai shekara na fuskantar tuhume-tuhumen cin hi da rashawa bayan ya shafe shekaru a kan karagar mulki 

"Mun san kuna bukatar a warware wannan batun cikin sauri", inji Mista a yayin da yake ganawa da wasu mutane a lokacin bikin tunawa da cika shekara da haihuwar marigayi , tsohon shugaba kasa kuma bakar fata na farko a kasar 

Masana sun ce idan babban kwamitin jam'iyyar ya nemi Mista ya sauka, lallai ba shi da zabi illa yayi hakan

Mitocin Da Muke Wa Shirye-Shiryenmu

Sashen Hausa na yana wa shirye-shirye guda hudu a kowacce rana, na won minti ta-ta a Hausa Akwai shirin Safe, akwai shirin Hantsi, akwai shirin Rana, sannan kuma akwai shirin , dukkaninsu a lokutta kamar haka A gajeren zango 
Idan kana Nijeriya zaka iya samun labarai ta hanyar sako akan wayar salularka ta ko daga sashen Hausa na 

Aika bukatarka ta hanyar sakon   akan layin ko na , domin samun sako ba ba rana na manyan labaran duniya

Abokan huldar Hausa
Ana samun shirye-shiryen Sashen Wa Labarai ga Kasashen Duniya na wato ta hanyar radiyo, da talabijin, da kuma intanet 

Wannan alaka tana baiwa damar gabatar da zababbun shirye-shiryenta ga jama'a masu tarin yawa

Lokaci a agogon da muke wa shirye-shirye
A ranar Lahadi ta buga canjaras kaninta da a gasar cin kofin a wasan mako na 

ya buga karawar wadda ita ce ta a manyan wasanni da ya taka-leda a filin 

Cikin wasa da ya yi a filin ya ci kwallo a fafatawa a gasar , ya kuma buga wasa a gasar cin kofin Zakarun Turai nan kuma ya ci kwallo 

Dan wasan na tawagar kwallon kafa ta ya yi wasa ya ci kwallo a gasar , sannan cikon ya buga ya ci kwallo a dai filin na

Yanayin da mata ke shiga yayin renon ciki da haihuwa


Ku la alamar lasifikar da ke sama don sauraron cikakken shirin

A wannan mako shirin Adikon Zamani ya yi duba ne a kan ma lolin da mata ke fuskanta a bangaren renon ciki a haihuwa 

Bakuwata a wannan makon ita ce wata likitar mata, wadda ita ma uwa ce, a Ibrahim 

Samun ciki na daya daga cikin abubuwa masu muhimmi da kan samu mace a rayuwarta 

Abun farin ciki ne, amma wasu matan hakan kan zo musu da tarin ma loli, kama daga amai da tashin zuciya da sauran ciwuka manya da kanana, a wasu lokutan ma har da ciwukan da kan yi barazanar tafiya da rayuwarsu 

Ni da likitar mun tattauna sosai kan yadda za a iya daukar matakan rage radadin halin da mata kan samu kansu a ciki lokacin rainon ciki 

Samun haihuwa abu ne mai matukar dadi a rayuwa, sai dai a arewacin Najeriya har yanzu ana fama da yawan mace-macen mata da jarirai a sanadin haihuwa, saboda rashin wadatacciyar kula da ba sa samu yayin rainon ciki, musamman ma a karkara 

Muna nukatar neman mafita ga wannan yanayi da mata ke shiga Wani lokacin sai na ga kamar ba ma daukar yanayin ciki da haihuwa da muhimmi, bayan kuwa mun san cewa magana ce ta ko a mutu ko a rayu 

Samun da ba abu ne na wasa ba, amma ina mamakin yadda bangaren lafiya ba ya mayar da hankali sosai wajen taimakawa masu ciki da jar da ake haifa 

Yin awon ciki wanda ke da matukar muhimmi ya zama kwalele ga mata marasa galihu 

A cewar likitoci, rashin isasshiyar kula na iya jawo wa uwaye da jarirai ma la ko da can gaba ne a rayuwarsu 

Alal misali, wani bincike ya gani cewa uwayen da ke samun isasshiyar kulawa yayin da suke da ciki, sun fi haifar yara masu cikakkiyar lafiya 
"Mata ne a baya a fannin kimiyya da fasaha "A ranar ga watan Fabrairun kowacce shekara ne ake bikin ranar wayar da kai game da gudunmawar mata ga harkar kimiyya da fasaha a duniya 

Majalisar Dinkin Duniya, ta ce ita da hukumominta sun lura cewa a shekara da ta wuce, an samu wawakeken gibi a kanin mata da maza a harkar kimiyya da fasaha a duniya 

Babban abin takaicin ma, a cewar Majalisar, shi ne matan, koma-baya suka kara samu a harkar, a maimakon ci gaba 

To a kan haka , ta tattauna da wata jami'a a cibiyar fasahar sadarwa da bunkasa al'umma wato, Maryam Ado Haruna, wadda ta ce gaskiya an bar mata a baya a wannan bangare, kuma hakan baya rasa nasaba da wasu dalilai da suka hada da al'ada, musamman a arewacin Najeriya, inda ake ganin ire-iren wannan karatu na kimiyya da fasaha na 'ya'ya maza ne kawai 

Maryam Ado, ta ce dalili na biyu kuwa shi ne koma bayan da mata suka samu a harkar ilimi, tun da sau da dama a wasu wurare ba a bari mata suyi zurfin ilimi ake aurar da su 

Dalili na uku kuwa inji jami'ar shi ne, rashin wadanda 'ya'ya matan za su gani suyi koyi da su a wannan fanni 

Yadda Tunkiya ta rikita masana kimiyya

Addinin Musulunci bai hana binciken kimiyya ba Hayat Al-Sindi

Maryam Ado, ta ce bisa la'akari da wannan koma baya da mata suka samu a bangaren kimiyya da fasaha, cibiyarsu na kokari wajen wayar da kan mata da kuma iyaye a kan su rinka barin 'ya'yansu mata na shiga a dama dasu a bangaren kimiyya da fasaha 

Jami'ar ta ce, yakamata a rinka wayar da kan mutane game da rawar da mata za su taka a fannin kimiyya da fasaha, domin hakan zai matukar taimakawa a samu ci gaba a kowacce al'umma 
ya harba rokar dauke da mota zuwa duniyar 
An yi nasarar harba wata roka zuwa sararin samaniya daga da aka kera mafi karfi fiye da wadanda aka taba gani a baya 

Wani attajirin Amurka ne mai suna ya kera rokar da ya kira wanda aka bayyana cewa ta lunka abin da sauran rokokin da aka kera a baya ke iya dauka 

An harba rokar a cibiyar ta zuwa sararin samaniya, a gaban idon tsohon kwamandan cibiyoyin zuwa sararin samaniya na duniya 

Mistaya shaidawa cewa yanzu rokar ce mafi g  a duniya "kuma kallon yadda ya tashi sama, ya nuna yana aiki lafiya lau ba wata tangarda" a cewar shi
